4a1('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan zas
4a2('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi
4a3('bum): ldan pas 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag myed
4a4('bum): pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya/ nye pa dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid
4a5('bum): la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i
4a6('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
4a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du shes gang smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
4a8('bum): la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'dra shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan
4b1('bum): bas 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid
4b2('bum): la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
4b3('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang
4b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
4b5('bum): yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang stong pa'i na ma par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
4b6('bum): myi ldan pas 'du byed gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang gyi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang
4b7('bum): smond pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang gyi ldan pas 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam
4b8('bum): mar yid la byed pa de kyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de gyi dmyigs pa
8a1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya bas myi gtong zhing
8a2('bum): brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de myi 'jigs myi sdang
8a3('bum): skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
8a4('bum): yid la bya bas gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba'i chos de ma
8a5('bum): yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba/ gzhan gyi skabs myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems da/ pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
8a6('bum): nem rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
8a7('bum): myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshenam rnam pa thams
8a8('bum): cad ma khyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rdog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba
8b1('bum): de mA da kyi byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
8b2('bum): bya nyid ste ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub
8b3('bum): kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi ko mya 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
8b4('bum): yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyig sa pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang/
8b5('bum): chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
8b6('bum): cad ma khye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyand thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
8b7('bum): myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
8b8('bum): thabras cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
12a1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog
12a3('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi kau myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi
12a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sa sa rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mya
12a6('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du
12a7('bum): byed smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba re ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
12a8('bum): gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
12b1('bum): 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su
12b2('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
12b3('bum): la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
12b4('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
12b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog/ cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
12b6('bum): la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
12b7('bum): chenam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
12b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go mya'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
13a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
13a2('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
13a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing
13a4('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba ga/ zhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
13a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid da nga ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa
13a6('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi
13a7('bum): go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
13a8('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
13b1('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
13b2('bum): bas rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
13b3('bum): bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
13b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog/ cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
13b5('bum): la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg/ sa su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
13b6('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
13b7('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha
13b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gyi 'jigs kyi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
27a1('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
27a2('bum): gang de la sna mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
27a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
27a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
27a5('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
27a6('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
27a7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la
27a8('bum): myig smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
27b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
27b2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
27b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi
27b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba// thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma ga/ togs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
27b5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
27b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang srungs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
27b7('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor dgazhan
27b8('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
31a1('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
31a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
31a3('bum): kyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
31a4('bum): gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
31a5('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o/ gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
31a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
31a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de myi
31a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i rgyal gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug
31b1('bum): ba'o// gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
31b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
31b3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
31b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la smra mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
31b5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond
31b6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mtshan ma myed
31b7('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
31b8('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
32a1('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
32a2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan
32a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
32a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra smond pa myed ces
32a5('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
32a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
32a7('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
32a8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg smond pa myed ces bya bar po
32b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
32b2('bum): gang de la chos smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
32b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya
32b4('bum): ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
32b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
32b6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi
32b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
32b8('bum): pa'o// gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
33a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
33a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mngon par 'du
33a3('bum): bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
33a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de ge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes
33a5('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
33a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la spa dber zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
33a7('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la dri dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
33a8('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la ro dber zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
33b1('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
33b2('bum): gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
33b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
33b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byo// rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
33b5('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos s+ho/ nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
33b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
33b7('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
33b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
34a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
34a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
34a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
34a4('bum): gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi gyi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
34a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
34a6('bum): gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
34a7('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
34a8('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
34b1('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
34b2('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
34b3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
34b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs/ rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
34b5('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
34b6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi
34b7('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
34b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
35a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces
35a2('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
35a3('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
35a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar
35a5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
35a6('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
35a7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// /
35a8('bum): bam po gsum pa//
35b1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
35b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes
35b3('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
35b4('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
35b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rna ma par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
35b6('bum): chos da cing / dge ban pa mas / rnam pa sa ba sa byed pa nyid gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis songs su spyod gyi 'jug pa'o// gang
35b7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
35b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
36a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
36a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
36a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs/ rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
36a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / nam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
36a6('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
36a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa spong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
36a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o//
36b1('bum): gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
36b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma
36b3('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
36b4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
36b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya sa kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna 'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
36b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
36b7('bum): gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
36b8('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
37a1('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa
37a2('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
37a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces bya bar
37a4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma hA rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
37a5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam pa ra shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
37a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
37a7('bum): rgyal gyim chom pa cing dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang
37a8('bum): de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
37b1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
37b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa smond pa
37b3('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
37b4('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces
37b5('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / da ge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
37b6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
37b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar
37b8('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
38a1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
38a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi
38a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
38a4('bum): pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'a/ du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos s+ho// nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thos

38a6('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

38b1('bum): shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas

38b4('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//

38b7('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing

39a5('bum): de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kyi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
39a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba zas
39a7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyedad pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
39a8('bum): dpa' chen po 'dage pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

50a4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
50a5('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
50a6('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
50a7('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
50a8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi
50b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
50b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
50b3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de
50b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
50b5('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor da gzha na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba 'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
50b6('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
50b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
50b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
51a1('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
51a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
51a3('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
51a4('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog sa par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol
51a5('bum): tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
51a6('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin pa'i pha
51a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am ra
51a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rdul khrims kyi pha rol la tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
51b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig
51b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
51b3('bum): gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
51b4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
51b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
51b6('bum): gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
51b7('bum): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol
51b8('bum): tu phyi nad pa zhi zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
52a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
52a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
52a3('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson
52a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
52a5('bum): zos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/ dpa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
52a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
52a7('bum): byin pazhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
52a8('bum): kyi mar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa spong zhes bya bar re
52b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/
52b2('bum): gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
52b3('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
52b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong
52b5('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
52b6('bum): kyi mar yongs su byor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang da la bsam gtan gyi pha ro la tu phyin du pa song zhes bya bar de ci dmyigs pa'i rgyal gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa tha thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
52b7('bum): da ma khyen du pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la zhes rab kyi pha 'o mad cutu phyind pa spyong zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i rdum
52b8('bum): khyim chi ma ra cing / dag pa ma ba thams cad / rnam pa bams pa byed pa ci pa gnyigs pa gyid thob kyil sa mi rjod gyi lug pa'o// ya ma
53a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond
53a2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi
53a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
53a4('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
53a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
53a6('bum): gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
53a7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
53a8('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi
53b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
