53b3('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
53b4('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
53b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jugapa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa
53b6('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
53b7('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/
53b8('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
54a1('bum): kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
54a2('bum): pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog
54a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin
54a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
54a5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de
54a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
54a7('bum): pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
54a8('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i
54b1('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
54b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
54b3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
54b4('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
54b5('bum): rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
54b6('bum): tshul kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
54b7('bum): kang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyam
54b8('bum): zos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
55a1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
55a2('bum): phyind pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
55a3('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
55a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya
55a5('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
55a6('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
55a7('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
55a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
55b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
55b2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
55b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar/
55b4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
55b5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong / pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
55b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
55b7('bum): pa'i tshul kyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
55b8('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
56a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
56a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
56a3('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa te da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
56a4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba mye// da pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul/ gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
56a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi
56a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
56a7('bum): pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog
56a8('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
56b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
56b2('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
56b3('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang
56b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
56b5('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
56b6('bum): pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa bo thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
56b7('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
56b8('bum): gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
57a1('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
57a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
57a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
57a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
57a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond
57a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong
57a7('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
57a8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
57b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
57b2('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha'
57b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
57b4('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dra ga pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyi da sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
57b5('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa lam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/
57b6('bum): gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
57b7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gyi sar yongs su ldar gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong ba nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de phyi tshogs pa'i tshul gyi ma chos ston dngas/ dge ba'i
58a1('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
58a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
58a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
58a4('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
58a5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid su ga bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos so nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa zhes
58a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
58a7('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos
58a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
58b1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag
58b2('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
58b3('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
58b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag rtse da ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
58b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
58b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
58b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
58b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ror dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dbyim
59a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
59a2('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
59a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
59a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha'
59a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha mas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
59a6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
59a7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de
59a8('bum): la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
59b1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
59b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi
59b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
59b4('bum): pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag mye/ da ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
59b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa sa rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi
59b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
59b7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
59b8('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
60a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i/
60a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
60a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi
60a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gto/ gas par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
60a5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
60a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
60a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes
60a8('bum): bya bar de gyi dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sam yongs su
60b1('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
60b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
60b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'i zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
60b4('bum): gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
60b5('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
60b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
60b7('bum): pathams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
60b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
61a1('bum): la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
61a2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
61a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
61a4('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
61a5('bum): pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
61a6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
61a7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes
61a8('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
61b1('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
61b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa
61b3('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
61b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
61b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
61b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
61b7('bum): la phyi nang grongs nyid spong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chus kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
61b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
62a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
62a2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
62a3('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
62a4('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
62a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
62a6('bum): kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
62a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
62a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la thog sa dang ma byed pa stong ba nyid stong zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang /
62b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
62b2('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin
62b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
62b4('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
62b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes
62b6('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
62b7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyam
62b8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
63a1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar
63a2('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
63a3('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
63a4('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan ya nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
63a5('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya par de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
63a6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
63a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
63a8('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
63b1('bum): pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
63b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
63b3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces
63b4('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
63b5('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus bya/ sa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chu la gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
63b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
63b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
63b8('bum): la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
64a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
64a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed
64a3('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
64a4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma mye// da ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
64a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
64a6('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang
64a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
64a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

64b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya/ bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
64b5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma / gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang
64b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
64b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
64b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
65a1('bum): gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
65a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
65a3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid smond pa myed
65a4('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
65a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
65a6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar de
65a7('bum): kyi dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa
65a8('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
65b1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smod pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
65b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid smon na
65b3('bum): pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
65b4('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor myed pa stong pa nyi da smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
65b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi
65b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
65b7('bum): pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
65b8('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
66a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong
66a2('bum): pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
66a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
66a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa// 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de
66a5('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha mas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
66a6('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
66a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
66a8('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
66b1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
66b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed
66b3('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
66b4('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mdo na bar 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
66b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya
66b6('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
66b7('bum): pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
66b8('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
67a1('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la/
67a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
67a3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonang
67a4('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
67a5('bum): pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
67a6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor pa
67a7('bum): myed pa stong ba nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
67a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
67b1('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
67b2('bum): gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
67b3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya
67b4('bum): ba myed ces bya bar/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
67b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
67b6('bum): chus kyim com ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o//
67b7('bum): gang sa ngam pa myed pa spong pa nyid mang par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i dus kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
67b8('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
68a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed
68a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
68a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi
68a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha// mas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog/ sa par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
68a5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
68a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
68a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
68a8('bum): dben zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
68b1('bum): sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
68b2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
68b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya
68b4('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
68b5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
68b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
68b7('bum): pa'i rdul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang
68b8('bum): de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dper zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
69a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
69a2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de
69a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
69a4('bum): gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi / myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
69a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
69a6('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs
69a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
69a8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
69b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
69b2('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed
69b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
69b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa
69b5('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
69b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
69b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su snor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang des dran pa nye bar gas
69b8('bum): brnams bdag byed ces bya bar kyi myigs pa'i rgyas kyim chom men cing / dge ba'i sa pa thams ca kyang / rnam pa thams pad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa cad pam kyim ma
70a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar songs su snor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'i zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chom man cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang /
70a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi
70a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
70a4('bum): pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston dacing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
70a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smond pa myed ces
70a6('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
70a7('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
70a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de gyi
70b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
70b2('bum): gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
70b3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
70b4('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong
70b5('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
70b6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
70b7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams
70b8('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
71a1('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams/
71a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spos su sngor ci 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
71a3('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par
71a4('bum): spong ba rnams smond pa phyed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam da pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
71a5('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba rtse da ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
71a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams
71a7('bum): dben zhes bya bar de myi dgas pa'i dus kyis chom smon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar som
71a8('bum): rjor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang des yang dag par spong ba rnams pasgom pa'i phyir de gyi dbyigs pa'i chus kyis chom yod cing / dge ba'i sa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mtho pa nyid
71b1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
71b2('bum): kham po sa pa/ gang des su 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rtag ces bya ba
71b3('bum): dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang
71b4('bum): de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
71b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
71b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes
71b7('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug
71b8('bum): pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
72a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
72a2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de
72a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
72a4('bum): gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed/ ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / da ge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
72a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis
72a6('bum): rtsom gror cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyedad pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi
72a7('bum): rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
72a8('bum): kyi mar 'ongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar de myi dbyigs pa'i chul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
72b1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
72b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bdag myed ces
72b3('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
72b4('bum): pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyi/ gas pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
72b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo ra myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
72b6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya/
72b7('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi
72b8('bum): 'dug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
73a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
73a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya
73a3('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
73a4('bum): ba'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi myigs pa'i tshul kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
73a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo ra myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
73a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes
73a7('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
73a8('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
73b1('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
73b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
73b3('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
73b4('bum): stobs rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
73b5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'ju ga pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams smond pa myed ces bya/ bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
73b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams
73b7('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
73b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
74a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
74a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
74a3('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
74a4('bum): su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag na mas sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis cho sa stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
74a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed ces bya
74a6('bum): rabya gyigs pa'i tshus kyim chos ston cing / dge ba'i ma tha thams pa rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid su gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
74a7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang des kyang chub kyi yar lag rnams ni zhes bya bar kyi dmyigs pa'i rdul kyis chos don cing / dge ba'i ma pa thams pa kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid sa
74a8('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams song zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i chus kyi ma chos ston pacing
74b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
74b2('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
74b3('bum): sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
74b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang des byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du ba ba myed
74b5('bum): ces bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing da ge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
74b6('bum): rgyas kyi ma yongs su rtsor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chom son nga / dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kya/ rab pa thams cad
74b7('bum): mabye pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su rtson gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi sa garnams bsgom pa'i phyir de gyi rtsigs pa'i rdul gyim pa ra/
74b8('bum): nga/ dge pas pa thamams cang / rnam pa thams pa rgyang ma kyid ma gtogs pa can thas kyis sangs rgyal kyi yar mongs su rdzo gyi lun pa'o//
75a1('bum): 6/ lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
75a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
75a3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bya bar
75a4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog sa par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
75a5('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rlo sa stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
75a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
75a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
75a8('bum): de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
75b1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa skyed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i/
75b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
75b3('bum): pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
75b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'ang/ gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de myi myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
75b5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gto gas par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yodas su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i
75b6('bum): lam yan lage brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
75b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bya
75b8('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
76a1('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
76a2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
76a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
76a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ra pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
76a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
76a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig
76a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
76a8('bum): de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston pa byed ces bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
76b1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
76b2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi
76b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
76b4('bum): gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
76b5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
76b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams sdug
76b7('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
76b8('bum): mu snor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
77a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
77a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar
77a3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
77a4('bum): gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi nga myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
77a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
77a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan
77a7('bum): rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
77a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi mar yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i sa pa thams cad kyang / rnam
77b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
77b2('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa
77b3('bum): rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
77b4('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa rnam sa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
77b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 8nga sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// ga/ nga de la tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
77b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
77b7('bum): de la tshad myed pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang na pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog pa nyan thos kyis 'arangasas rgyas kyi sa mo bu co gyi 'alug 'o// de la tshad myed pa rnams
77b8('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
78a1('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/
78a2('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
78a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa rnams mngon par
78a4('bum): 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos so// nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
78a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// ga nga de la tshad myed pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
