78a6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chad myed pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
78a7('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lag
78a8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams nad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
78b1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
78b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
78b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
78b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
78b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de gzugs myed
78b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
78b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
78b8('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyom sa
79a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
79a2('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
79a3('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed
79a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha mas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
79a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo ngas su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs
79a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
79a7('bum): gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
79a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
79b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
79b2('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
79b3('bum): la rnam par thard pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
79b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
79b5('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams
79b6('bum): mtsham ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
79b7('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
79b8('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
80a1('bum): sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
80a2('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams dber zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
80a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de kyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
80a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs sa kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi rtag ces
80a5('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge/ ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
80a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ro myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
80a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
80a8('bum): 'dug pa dgu bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
80b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
80b2('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong
80b3('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
80b4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthard kyis gnas pa'i s+ho// mas par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
80b5('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs pa ra nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i
80b6('bum): snyoms par 'dug pa dgu smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
80b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
80b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthard kyis gnas
81a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
81a2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa
81a3('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
81a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya b.rade myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog/
81a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa sdug bsngal/
81a6('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
81a7('bum): sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
81a8('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
81b1('bum): myed pa dang smond pa myed pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
81b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
81b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
81b4('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba/ 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
81b5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa
81b6('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
81b7('bum): yongs su sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
81b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
82a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
82a2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs
82a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
82a4('bum): gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
82a5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ra yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
82a6('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
82a7('bum): la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
82a8('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
82b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i/
82b2('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
82b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
82b4('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing /
82b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa sa rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
82b6('bum): de la mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
82b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
82b8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i
83a1('bum): phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
83a2('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
83a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
83a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma ga/ rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lo/ ngas su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin
83a5('bum): rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sa stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
83a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
83a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
83a8('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge
83b1('bum): 'dzind rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
83b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
83b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
83b4('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan tho/ sa kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi
83b5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
83b6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
83b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces
83b8('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
84a1('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
84a2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
84a3('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
84a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chu/ la gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
84a5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhe sa bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
84a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sku
84a7('bum): rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
84a8('bum): mangs rgyas kyi mar yos su rjod gyi 'jug pa'o// gang del gzus kyi sgornams rmon sa myed ces bya bar gyi myigs pa'i tshul kyis chom yon cing / dge ba'i ma pa thamasas
84b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya
84b2('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
84b3('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
84b4('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzu ngas kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
84b5('bum): kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan sa kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
84b6('bum): 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bzhes gnyeran ni/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
84b7('bum): pa'i rgyas khyim chos gon cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o//
84b8('bum): gang das de bzhi gshegs pa'i skabs pacu mug pasngal zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i sa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mi byed pa nyid
85a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
85a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
85a3('bum): gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
85a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo bas bcu stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
85a5('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan blo/ sa kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
85a6('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
85a7('bum): mnyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig
85a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
85b1('bum): gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
85b2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
85b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
85b4('bum): bcu bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston da cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
85b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
85b6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ma nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gyi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
85b7('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
85b8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtog
86a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
86a2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar
86a3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jun
86a4('bum): pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma myed sa bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
86a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya sa kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
86a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
86a7('bum): de la myi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
86a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
86b1('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs
86b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
86b3('bum): de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
86b4('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
86b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so
86b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
86b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
86b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi
87a1('bum): de byi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi
87a2('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
87a3('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mo mo yang dag par rig pa rnams stonod pa myed ces bya ba
87a4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'irtsapa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma ga rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
87a5('bum): yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de phyi myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
87a6('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
87a7('bum): dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
87a8('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
87b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
87b2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po
87b3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
87b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
87b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
87b6('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
87b7('bum): gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
87b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
88a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad ma khyedang pa nyid la gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po smond pa myed ces bya bar de gyi
88a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
88a3('bum): pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
88a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po dben zhe sa bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
88a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sang sa rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
88a6('bum): la snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
88a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
88a8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
88b1('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
88b2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
88b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
88b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
88b5('bum): pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond ci / nga / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
88b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi
88b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
88b8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
89a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar
89a2('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
89a3('bum): pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
89a4('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
89a5('bum): kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
89a6('bum): pa'o// gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir de phyi dmyig bI tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
89a7('bum): pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas
89a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o//
89b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag rgya pa// / bam po drug pa'o// // rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
89b2('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang
89b3('bum): skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
89b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa bstand pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs myi mkhas te/ sdi ga pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen
89b5('bum): kyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
89b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom zhing dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa des rlom sems su
89b7('bum): byed pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom zhing dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa des rlom
89b8('bum): sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ brtsod 'grus kyi pha rom tu phyind pa des
90a1('bum): rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sbom zhing dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind
90a2('bum): pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
90a3('bum): tu phyind pa res rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
90a4('bum): pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thams myi mkhas par rig par bya'o//
90a5('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
90a6('bum): myed par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
90a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
90a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa
90b1('bum): zhes bya bar yong sa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma/ rnam pa thams
90b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang
90b3('bum): rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ gzugs chen po spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/
90b4('bum): de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
90b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ zugs don dam pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ gas pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
90b6('bum): stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye dang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus byas spong pa
90b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
90b8('bum): pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis 'dus ma thas spong ba nyid kyang dmyigs
91a1('bum): sa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs
91a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
91a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
91a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
91a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba myed par/ gzugs dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
91a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
91a7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
91a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
91b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong
91b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
91b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
91b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
91b5('bum): gzugs dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
91b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
91b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i chus kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
91b8('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
92a1('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
92a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar myed par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
92a3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skye/ da pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
92a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
92a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyin nga stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
92a6('bum): pa byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i mi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
92a7('bum): pa'i tshul kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
92a8('bum): yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba chen po spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la song ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
92b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong
92b2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba
92b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
92b4('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya b.rayid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong
92b5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye/ da do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
92b6('bum): myed par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
92b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
92b8('bum): pa'i rdul gyis pog ma dang pa ma byed pa stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la spyod pa'i me/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
93a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems/
93a2('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig
93a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
93a4('bum): la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya ba/ ra yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad s+ho// nga pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
93a5('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
93a6('bum): byed de/ dbyigs pa'i chus kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
93a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nor ba kyi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang
93a8('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar mamim
93b1('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
93b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
93b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
93b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// ra ba 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
93b5('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya pa myed par/ 'du shes nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
93b6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
93b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
93b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong
94a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
94a2('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
94a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du shes chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
94a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes don dam
94a5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
94a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
94a7('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la myed par/ 'du shes 'dus ma
94a8('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
94b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du shes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa
94b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
94b3('bum): 'du shes thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
94b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
94b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
94b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
94b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes
94b8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
95a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes rang gi mtshan nyid spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
95a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du
95a3('bum): shes myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
95a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de/ nga ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes dngos po myed pa/ stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
95a5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
95a6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes
95a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
95a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
95b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
95b2('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du byed phyi
95b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
95b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong/
95b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du byed stong
95b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
95b7('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa
95b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid sa bya ba byed pa'adu byed dom ngas pa stong pa zhes bya bar
96a1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
96a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
96a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed pa byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
96a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
96a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das
96a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
96a7('bum): 'du byed thog ma dang pam myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog pa dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
96a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par// 'du byed dor ba myed pa spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
96b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
96b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
96b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
96b4('bum): tshul gyis tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
96b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
96b6('bum): nyi kyi sa kyi te tu tumo po'i ma byed/ gas rab kyi pha rol tu myind pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par / 'du byed kyi dmyigs pa 'o
96b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/
96b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par la/ 'ad byed dngos po myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
97a1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed ngo bo
97a2('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
97a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du byed dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
97a4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
97a5('bum): pa la byed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa nang / nga pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
97a6('bum): rang stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
97a7('bum): nam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sbyong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
97a8('bum): la spyod pa'i mi/ nam pa thams cad ma khyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis kyi nang spong pa nyid
97b1('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes/
97b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa chus kyis stong pa nyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe
97b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
97b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes
97b5('bum): pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
97b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
97b7('bum): kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying
97b8('bum): la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
98a1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
98a2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
98a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha
98a4('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
98a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba skye da pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu la gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong
98a6('bum): nyid kris kyang rlob sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams padus byed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sangs bya ba skyed byar/ rnam par shes pa rang ba'i
98a7('bum): thong ba zhes bya bar ying la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i chus kyis rang bzhin po nyid dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
98a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad sa byed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba byed par/ rnam par gas pa chom thams cad spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i tshul gyim cho ma sems cid thong pa nyid
98b1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par
98b2('bum): shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
98b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
98b4('bum): gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
98b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa dang / sa po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
98b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong
98b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
98b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
99a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
99a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
99a3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
99a4('bum): gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
99a5('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya ba ra yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi nga dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
99a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
99a7('bum): kyis spong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yongs
99a8('bum): bya ba myed par/ myig chen mo stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab
99b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong /
99b2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
99b3('bum): myig 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
99b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig 'dus ma bya/ sa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
99b5('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
99b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
99b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes
99b8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
100a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi la bya bskyed par/ rtsig dong bskyed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ myigs pa'i tshul kyis dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
100a2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig rang bzhin stong pa zhes
100a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
100a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa/ ra/ myig chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
100a5('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
100a6('bum): myig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
100a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
100a8('bum): kya dbyigs la / spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol sa phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ byig
100b1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
100b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
100b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
100b4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang
100b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba nang stong
100b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
100b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
100b8('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
101a1('bum): byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
101a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
101a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen
101a4('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
101a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya/ bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
101a6('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
101a7('bum): dbyigs pa'i rgyas kyim 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyirid pa la spyod pa'i// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
101a8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par / na ba 'dus ma byas song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas spong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
101b1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
101b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
101b3('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
101b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba dor ba myed pa stong
101b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo/ ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
101b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
101b7('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba
101b8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
102a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
102a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
102a3('bum): rna ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
102a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid da nga ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
102a5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kya ngarlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
102a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ na ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
102a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
102a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re shes
