102b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
102b2('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna phyi stong pa
102b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
102b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu la gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
102b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna stong pa nyid stong pa
102b6('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
102b7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
102b8('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
103a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
103a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
103a3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
103a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
103a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyig sa pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyis
103a6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna thog ma dang tha ma
103a7('bum): byed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
103a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
103b1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
103b2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
103b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
103b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba myed par/ sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
103b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
103b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
103b7('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
103b8('bum): sna dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
104a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
104a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
104a3('bum): myed par/ sna dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
104a4('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
104a5('bum): par/ lce nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
104a6('bum): tu byonang pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
104a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gre phyi nang spong pa zhes bya bar
104a8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
104b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
104b2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
104b3('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
104b4('bum): la bya ba myed par/ lce don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
104b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye/ da par/ lce 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
104b6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
104b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
104b8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
105a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
105a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed
105a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
105a4('bum): lce dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
105a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
105a6('bum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
105a7('bum): bya ba myed par/ lce chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
105a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
105b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
105b2('bum): myed par/ lce myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
105b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce dngos po myed pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa
105b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
105b5('bum): myed par/ lce ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ myigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab
105b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
105b7('bum): phyis dngos po byed pa'i rngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rom
105b8('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis nang stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs/
106a1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus phyi stong
106a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
106a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed/
106a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
106a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
106a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom seMs
106a7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs/
106a8('bum): ba'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
106b1('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
106b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
106b3('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
106b4('bum): ba myed par lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
106b5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sus thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
106b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
106b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dbyig
106b8('bum): ya/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus rang bzhin spong /
107a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/
107a2('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
107a3('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus rang gi
107a4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
107a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
107a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
107a7('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
107a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sus ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dza
107b1('bum): banyid dang pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la spyod pa'i ye rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya ba myed par/
107b2('bum): lus dngos po byed pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
107b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyab bam po bdun pa// / rab 'byor dgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
107b4('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshem pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ yid rang spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dbyig
107b5('bum): pa'i tshus kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su med do// regs rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
107b6('bum): yid la bya ba byed par/ 'od kyi spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis kyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la song pa nyid kyis kyang rnasems su byed do// shes rab kyi
107b7('bum): lang kyi phyi dadapa la spyod pa'i tshe / rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par yid gyi nang song ba zhes bya bar yid sa byed de/ dartson ma pa'i tshus kyis kyi
108a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
108a2('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par yid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
108a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
108a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang /
108a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed parayid don dam pa stong pa zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
108a6('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
108a7('bum): byed dedamyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
108a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
108b1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar/
108b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
108b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
108b4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
108b5('bum): yid dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de myigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
108b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid rang bzhin spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
108b7('bum): kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
108b8('bum): bya ba myed parayid chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
109a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
109a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
109a3('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par yid myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
109a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
109a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
109a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid ngo bo nyid spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
109a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
109a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
109b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar
109b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
109b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
109b4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs phyi nang stong pa
109b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi na nga stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom se mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
109b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
109b7('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs
109b8('bum): chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
110a1('bum): spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa/
110a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs
110a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
110a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhe/ sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma
110a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo/ ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
110a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
110a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong /
110a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
110b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la myed par gzugs dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
110b2('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes
110b3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
110b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
110b5('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
110b6('bum): myed par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
110b7('bum): shes rab kyi ba ro yo sa byind pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs kyi dbyigs pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
110b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
111a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sangs bya ba myed par/ gzugs dngas po myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
111a2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
111a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zas
111a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
111a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
111a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
111a7('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ smra phyi stong pa zhes bya
111a8('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
111b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sgra phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
111b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa d+ma stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
111b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
111b4('bum): sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
111b5('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don
111b6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
111b7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ sgra 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
111b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sgra 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
112a1('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
112a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
112a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sgra thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes
112a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
112a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra dor ba myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ror
112a6('bum): bamyed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid sa bya ba byed
112a7('bum): par/ sgra rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// reshes rab kyi pha rol tu
112a8('bum): byid pa la spyod pa'i ma rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos tham pa
112b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
112b2('bum): sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
112b3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa
112b4('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
112b5('bum): sgra dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyig/ sa la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
112b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ smra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
112b7('bum): kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
112b8('bum): pa myed par/ sgra dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
113a1('bum): su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
113a2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ dri nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
113a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
113a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri phyi nang stong pa zhes
113a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang ste/ ra pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
113a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par dri stong gi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
113a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
113a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang /
113b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
113b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa
113b3('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par dri
113b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
113b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri ma tha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
113b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
113b7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
113b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri dor ba myed pa stong pa
114a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod
114a2('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
114a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri chos thams cad stong pa
114a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kya nga rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
114a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
114a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
114a7('bum): dri myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
114a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par dri dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
114b1('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri ngo bo nyid stong
114b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
114b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
114b4('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
114b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye da par/ ro nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
114b6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
114b7('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
114b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
115a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ro stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
115a2('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
115a3('bum): myed pararo chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
115a4('bum): spyod pa'i che sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba myed par/ ro don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye dade/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
115a5('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ro
115a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
115a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
115a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ro mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
115b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
115b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro sog ma dang pa sa byed pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyal kyis thog ma dang ba ma byed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
115b3('bum): la song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro dong ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya
115b4('bum): pa yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i rgyas kyis dor babyed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa'ing /
115b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid sa bya ba myed par/ ro rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
115b6('bum): grangs nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa la spyod pa'i// rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya ba byed par/ rochos thams cad song ba zhes
115b7('bum): yang sa gyid de/ sa pa'i rgyas byam tsham thams cad rna sa kyigs so/ kyis kyang bye do// denas sa kyi pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa
115b8('bum): cad ma khye pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba byed par/ rorang ni mtshan nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i rgyas kyis rangagim tshan nyid tho sa nyid kya dbyig sa sa thong pa nyid kyis kyang /
116a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar
116a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
116a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
116a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro bo nyid stong
116a5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ro bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom se mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
116a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ro dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
116a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
116a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
116b1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
116b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
116b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
116b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa ba mas cad mnyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
116b5('bum): pa'i tshul kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
116b6('bum): mkhyer pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do//
116b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis
116b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs ya / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la
117a1('bum): la bya ba myed par/ reg 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
117a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la myed par/ reg 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
117a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myigs pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ros ga byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yodas bya ba rtsed
117a4('bum): par/ reg mtha' las 'das pa spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa spong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
117a5('bum): byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rolang tu sbyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ reg thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong pa zhes bya bar
117a6('bum): yidas byed de/ myigs pa'i rgyas kyis sog sa dang pa ma byed pa slong sa nyid kya myigs la/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// dashes rab kyis ros tu na pas zu ma /
117a7('bum): xxx
117a8('bum): kyims pa sa kyis dang byed pa mi sa nyi kya gyis / 'ang sa cad kyis kya rna thamams cad/ dgapa bye pas
117b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
117b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
117b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
117b4('bum): ba myed par reg rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yi nga la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
117b5('bum): ro// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
117b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
117b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
117b8('bum): re shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo
118a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
118a2('bum): la bya ba myed par/ reg dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
118a3('bum): sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
118a4('bum): myed par/ chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
118a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong
118a6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos
118a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
118a8('bum): chernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chos stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs stong pa nyid
118b1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
118b2('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer du
118b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
118b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa / mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chos 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
118b5('bum): pa'i tshus kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
118b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
118b7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
118b8('bum): ma byed do// dmyigs pa'i rgyas gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
119a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chos thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
119a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chos
119a3('bum): dor ba byed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
119a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ye da la bya ba myed par/ chos rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar mi la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
119a5('bum): kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ro// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i charnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
119a6('bum): byed par / namatsham sems cad snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyas kyis chos thams cad spong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// reshes
119a7('bum): da pa sa nga ldan pa'i sad nga bzhes bya ba ming ma byed/
119a8('bum): rangagam can kyad mang sa nyid kyi myigs pa/ gang pa nyid kyis kyang chom sems su byed do// dgas rab kyi pha rol na phyi pa sa spyang pa'i/ rnam pa tham pa cad mthed pa nyid ma
119b1('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ chos myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
119b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
119b3('bum): kyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
119b4('bum): sa bya ba med par/ chos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar mi dal byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
119b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
119b6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
119b7('bum): dpa' chen po deshes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi sa bya ba byed par/ byig gnas par shes pa nang phreng ba zhes bya ba meng
119b8('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
120a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paramyig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
120a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes
120a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
120a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yi da la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
120a5('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
120a6('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
120a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
120a8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
120b1('bum): myed par myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
120b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
120b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
120b4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu/ la gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong
120b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi rnam
120b6('bum): par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
120b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
120b8('bum): tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
121a1('bum): la bya ba myed par myig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
121a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
121a3('bum): de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
121a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
121a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par
121a6('bum): shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
121a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
121a8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
121b1('bum): bya ba myed paramyig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
121b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
121b3('bum): dedamyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
121b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i ne par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
121b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
121b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
121b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ra ba'i rnam par shes pa myi nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
121b8('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
122a1('bum): par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
122a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen
122a3('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
122a4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
122a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
122a6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
122a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
122a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las
122b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
122b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
122b3('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
122b4('bum): myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom mos
122b5('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'itshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
122b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
122b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
122b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
123a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
123a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
123a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
123a4('bum): par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
123a5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
123a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
123a7('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
123a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
123b1('bum): shes rab / bam po brgyad pa'o// // rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
123b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
123b3('bum): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
123b4('bum): myed par sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yi dal byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
123b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
123b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/
123b7('bum): yid la bya ba myed par sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
123b8('bum): re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
124a1('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
124a2('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
124a3('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
124a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
124a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong
124a6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i
124a7('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
124a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
124b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
124b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
124b3('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
124b4('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed/ do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
124b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa ni/ sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
124b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
124b7('bum): sna'i rnam par she ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
124b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i/
125a1('bum): tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
125a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
125a3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
125a4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi da kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
125a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo
125a6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
125a7('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
125a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi
125b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
125b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
125b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgo'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
125b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis s+ho// nga pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/
125b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i rnam par shes pa chen po ste/ nga pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
125b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
125b7('bum): myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
125b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
126a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
126a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
126a3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
126a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' la sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
