126a5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
126a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
126a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
126a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par
126b1('bum): shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
126b2('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
126b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
126b4('bum): myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
126b5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs
126b6('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
126b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed
126b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
127a1('bum): par lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
127a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
127a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab
127a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
127a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
127a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
127a7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
127a8('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
127b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
127b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa
127b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
127b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
127b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
127b6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
127b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
127b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
128a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
128a2('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam
128a3('bum): par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
128a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar
128a5('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
128a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
128a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes
128a8('bum): pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
128b1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
128b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
128b3('bum): bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
128b4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye/ da par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong
128b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
128b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid
128b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
128b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
129a1('bum): su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
129a2('bum): bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
129a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
129a4('bum): chul kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
129a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gyi rang song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul rgyas phyinang stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyi
129a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par zhes pa stong
129a7('bum): pa nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyus kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byed
129a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis chen po tha
129b1('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi
129b2('bum): rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
129b3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
129b4('bum): gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
129b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
129b6('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
129b7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
129b8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
130a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
130a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed
130a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
130a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
130a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad spyod pa zhes bya bar
130a6('bum): yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
130a7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
130a8('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par
130b1('bum): shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
130b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
130b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
130b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
130b5('bum): re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
130b6('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems
130b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar
130b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zhes
131a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paramyig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid/
131a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes
131a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
131a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
131a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi
131a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
131a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa
131a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
131b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
131b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
131b3('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
131b4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
131b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi
131b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
131b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig
131b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
132a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
132a2('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
132a3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
132a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yi da la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
132a5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
132a6('bum): myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do
132a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
132a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis dngom po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyed nga
132b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
132b2('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
132b3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
132b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong
132b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
132b6('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
132b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi
132b8('bum): nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
133a1('bum): che rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong
133a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
133a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
133a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
133a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
133a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
133a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas
133a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
133b1('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong
133b2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus
133b3('bum): te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
133b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
133b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
133b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang
133b7('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
133b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
134a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
134a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs
134a3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
134a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya/ par yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed
134a5('bum): bslong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ ngapa nyid kyis kyang rlom mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ros na phyin pa sa dpa'i / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
134a6('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngabo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
134a7('bum): de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po byed pa'i thotho nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
134a8('bum): de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis dngos po byed pa'i ngom nyid stong pa nyid kya dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byed do// rab 'byor dgazhan sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134b1('bum): chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
134b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
134b3('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
134b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
134b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
134b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
134b7('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
134b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
135a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
135a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus
135a3('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
135a4('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
135a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ro dpa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
135a6('bum): yid la bya ba myed parasna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
135a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
135a8('bum): spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i tshul kyis phog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
135b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong
135b2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te/
135b3('bum): reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
135b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
135b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
135b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
135b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong
135b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
136a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa
136a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
136a3('bum): par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
136a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i/ 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
136a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems
136a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
136a7('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
136a8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
136b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
136b2('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
136b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
136b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
136b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod / pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
136b6('bum): la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
136b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lo'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
136b8('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
137a1('bum): bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
137a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
137a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
137a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
137a5('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
137a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
137a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin
137a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// reshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/
137b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
137b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
137b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
137b4('bum): par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya ba ra yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
137b5('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya
137b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
137b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
137b8('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
138a1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems/
138a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
138a3('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
138a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
138a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong
138a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
138a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
138a8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po
138b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
138b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
138b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas
138b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
138b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
138b6('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
138b7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
138b8('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang
139a1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
139a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
139a3('bum): tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
139a4('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba byed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang ba bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
139a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ti ded dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te
139a6('bum): reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyis
139a7('bum): sa tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i mi / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
139a8('bum): rgyas kyim rang gi mtshan nyid spong sa nyid kya dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dges rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la spyod pa'i nga/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
139b1('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
139b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa
139b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
139b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid s+ho/ nga pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
139b5('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis ngarlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
139b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
139b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
139b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
140a1('bum): rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
140a2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
140a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
140a4('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / rna ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ra yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
140a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyi kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye/ // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
140a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
140a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong
140a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
140b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
140b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus
140b3('bum): ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
140b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la rgyapa myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa ni stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
140b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra/ lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
140b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
140b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
140b8('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
141a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
141a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
141a3('bum): par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
141a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
141a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
141a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa
141a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
141a8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
141b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
141b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
141b3('bum): bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
141b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
141b5('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
141b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
141b7('bum): ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
141b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
142a1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
142a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
142a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
142a4('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
142a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rgya ga gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa ni sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa
142a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed/
142a7('bum): par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
142a8('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong
142b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
142b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las
142b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar yid la
142b4('bum): bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
142b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
142b6('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
142b7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes
142b8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha
143a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
143a2('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
143a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paramyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
143a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
143a5('bum): phyag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus kyi sa kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
143a6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang
143a7('bum): mtshor ba dngas po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nus kyis dam po skyed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ song ba nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
143a8('bum): pa ro ma tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par / rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnga bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
143b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i chul kyim tshab nyid gong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ spangs nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha ro ma tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
143b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
143b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la spyod pa'i
143b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang po/ nga pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
143b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
143b6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
143b7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa
143b8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
144a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
144a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
144a3('bum): par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
144a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis
144a5('bum): tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
144a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar
144a7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
144a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
144b1('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg
144b2('bum): po'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
144b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar
144b4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
144b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye nad kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
144b6('bum): dedamyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
144b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang bzhin sdod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
144b8('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i
145a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chos thams cad spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
145a2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan
145a3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
145a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
145a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dbyig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
145a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
145a7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i
145a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
145b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
145b2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
145b3('bum): chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
145b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
145b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
145b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
145b7('bum): tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
145b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa
146a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
146a2('bum): par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
146a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
146a4('bum): de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyig nga sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
146a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
146a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
146a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
146a8('bum): ro// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das
146b1('bum): bzung ba zhes bya bar ya sa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das ma stong sa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// dgas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyor/
146b2('bum): pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
146b3('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
146b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye da de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
146b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
146b6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
146b7('bum): rishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad spong pa zhes bya bar
146b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa
147a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
147a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
147a3('bum): la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
147a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
147a5('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyi/ dkyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
147a6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
147a7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zas
147a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed
147b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
147b2('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
147b3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
147b4('bum): kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
147b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
147b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
147b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
147b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor
148a1('bum): pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/
148a2('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong
148a3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
148a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
148a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i me/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg
148a6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
148a7('bum): kyi pha ros tu myi dad pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
148a8('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
148b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma
148b2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs yang / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu myin la spyod pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed/
148b3('bum): par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
148b4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
148b5('bum): tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig sa pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
148b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyidang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chos thams cad spong ba zhes bya bar yang la byed de/
148b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
148b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
149a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus
149a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
149a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya
149a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
149a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
149a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
149a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
149a8('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
149b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong
