149b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang
149b3('bum): kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod
149b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
149b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
149b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/
149b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi 'dus te reg
149b8('bum): ba'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
150a1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pas yid la bya ba myed par/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis sbyor ba don dam pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid ma byed de/
150a2('bum): dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid
150a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas song ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
150a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro// lad tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te
150a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas/ stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
150a6('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong
150a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
150a8('bum): tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
150b1('bum): kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
150b2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
150b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
150b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyi dkyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
150b5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
150b6('bum): yid ma byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis chos thams cad spong pa nyid kyang dmyigs su/ pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
150b7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
150b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
151a1('bum): par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis/
151a2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
151a3('bum): ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
151a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
151a5('bum): de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
151a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
151a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol
151a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
151b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
151b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi
151b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
151b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyi dkyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
151b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te re ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
151b6('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi
151b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
151b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
152a1('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
152a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
152a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
152a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus sa byas spong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ phreng bo nyid kyis
152a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu myi nad pa la spyod pa'i rje / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
152a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
152a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes
152a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
152b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
152b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
152b3('bum): bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
152b4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
152b5('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
152b6('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
152b7('bum): pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
152b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
153a1('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadang pa la spyod pa'i
153a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
153a3('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
153a4('bum): pa myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
153a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te
153a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
153a7('bum): sems su byed do//
153a8('bum): shes rab / bam po dgu pa// / rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
153b1('bum): po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
153b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
153b3('bum): sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/
153b4('bum): tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
153b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
153b6('bum): par sa'i las stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
153b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
153b8('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
154a1('bum): sa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
154a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
154a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
154a4('bum): sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedade/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi nga dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
154a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
154a6('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
154a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
154a8('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
154b1('bum): sa'i 'ams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rom
154b2('bum): tu byi nang pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par/ pa'i khams rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis rang bzhin spong ba
154b3('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i
154b4('bum): khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
154b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i zhams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
154b6('bum): de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
154b7('bum): mabyedad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams kyi dmyigs pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
154b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams dngos po myed pa
155a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
155a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
155a3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams dngos
155a4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ gas pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyidang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
155a5('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
155a6('bum): ba myed par/ chu'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
155a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
155a8('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i
155b1('bum): khams kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
155b2('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
155b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes
155b4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong dpa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
155b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam
155b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
155b7('bum): par/ chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
155b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
156a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
156a2('bum): ba myed par/ chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' la 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
156a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
156a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
156a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams dor pa myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong
156a6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
156a7('bum): chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
156a8('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i che ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
156b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
156b2('bum): myed par/ chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
156b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
156b4('bum): gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
156b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams da ngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
156b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa
156b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
156b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par chu'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
157a1('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/
157a2('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
157a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
157a4('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
157a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ra/ mye'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
157a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams stong pa nyid
157a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
157a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
157b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams don dam pa
157b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
157b3('bum): tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
157b4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
157b5('bum): mye'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kya nga dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
157b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
157b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zhes
157b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
158a1('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
158a2('bum): mye'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
158a3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
158a4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
158a5('bum): rgya'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dbyin/ sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
158a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
158a7('bum): pa'i chus kyis rang gi mtshan nyid nas kyi kyigs stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pa ros tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyedad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
158a8('bum): sa byab myed par/ kye'i sems kyi byigs pagong pa zhes bya bar yi sa byed de/ myigs pa'i rgyas kyis kyi dmyigs pa meng pa nyid kyi myigs sa/ spongs nyid kyis kya rlom sems brjo //
158b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
158b2('bum): tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
158b3('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par mye'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
158b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
158b5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo/ bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
158b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya
158b7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa cwas kyis nang stong pa nyid dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
158b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
159a1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
159a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
159a3('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
159a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
159a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
159a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
159a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams 'dus
159a8('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
159b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa
159b2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rlung gi
159b3('bum): khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
159b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi kham sa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
159b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
159b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams dor ba myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ myigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
159b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong
159b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
160a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa
160a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung
160a3('bum): ki khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
160a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
160a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
160a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams dngos po byed pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyal gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong ba
160a7('bum): nyid kyis rgya la mams su byed do// dashes rab kyi kyi sa du byed pa sa spyod rnam pa thams padas khyed pa gyid dang ldan pa'i yidus bya brjed par/ rlu gi ba nyid thong pa nas
160a8('bum): bya mar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis jom nyid ska sa cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// reshes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
160b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi 'ams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
160b2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
160b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
160b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong
160b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom se/ mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la
160b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
160b7('bum): kyang dmyigs lastong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par nam
160b8('bum): mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
161a1('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
161a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
161a3('bum): paranam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
161a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
161a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
161a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
161a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams
161a8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
161b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
161b2('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
161b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
161b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab myed par/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes
161b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
161b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yo de la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i zhams chos thams cad stong pa zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thos
161b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
161b8('bum): ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
162a1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar
162a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
162a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par / nam mkha'i khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
162a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i
162a5('bum): khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
162a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
162a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
162a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
162b1('bum): ba'i rgyas kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
162b2('bum): la bya ba skyed par rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
162b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
162b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la / da pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
162b5('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul/ gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong
162b6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i
162b7('bum): khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
162b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
163a1('bum): gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang /
163a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
163a3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya
163a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom se mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
163a5('bum): ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
163a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
163a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i 'ams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
163a8('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam
163b1('bum): par shes pa'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
163b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
163b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
163b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
163b5('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
163b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
163b7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar
163b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
164a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos
164a2('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
164a3('bum): bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
164a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pathams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ra/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
164a5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor
164a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa nang
164a7('bum): spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pas spyod pa'i tshe
164a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
164b1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
164b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
164b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ma rig pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
164b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa chen po stong
164b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
164b6('bum): kyang ba nga/ rnam pa mams cas kyid pa nyid nga nayings khyab myed par/ ma rig pa na dam pa song pa zhes sa byed / pa pa'i dus rgyapa dang sa pa zang ba
164b7('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed param
164b8('bum): rig pa bcus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dang /
165a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus pa
165a2('bum): gabyas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
165a3('bum): ma rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
165a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa tho/ ga ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
165a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi nga dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
165a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ma rig pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
165a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa rang bzhin stong pa
165a8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
165b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
165b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong
165b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
165b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye da par/ ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong
165b5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyodapa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
165b6('bum): yid la bya ba myed par ma rig pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
165b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
165b8('bum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
166a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
166a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
166a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
166a4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang na pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya
166a5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
166a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
166a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed spyong pa
166a8('bum): nyid spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pas
166b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
166b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du byed don dam pa stong
166b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
166b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed 'alus byab stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye da de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
166b5('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye/ da do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
166b6('bum): myed par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
166b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
166b8('bum): tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
167a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
167a2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'du byed dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes
167a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyal gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
167a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyig sa pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
167a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad man+ta nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed
167a6('bum): chom thams cad spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro mod tu/
167a7('bum): byi dad pas spyong pa'ing/ rnam pa thams cad mabyedad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
167a8('bum): mtshan nyid spong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang
167b1('bum): sa bya ba myed par/ 'du byed kyi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
167b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par / 'du byed dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
167b3('bum): tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
167b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
167b5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed dngos po myed pa'i
167b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan
167b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa nang
167b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
168a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
168a2('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes
168a3('bum): pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
168a4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya/ bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
168a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
168a6('bum): la bya ba myed pararnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
168a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
168a8('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
168b1('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
168b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
168b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
168b4('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las la ngas pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
168b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad// mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pararnam
168b6('bum): par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi pa dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
168b7('bum): dashes rab kyi pha ro sa tu myid pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par/ rnam par shes pa da babyed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
168b8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
169a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mid la bya ba byed par rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
169a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa
169a3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/
169a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rtse da par rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya par yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
169a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
169a6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
169a7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa
169a8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
169b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
169b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa dngos
169b3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor
169b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dge sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
169b5('bum): mying dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi / gas pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa/ nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
169b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
169b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
169b8('bum): mying dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
170a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa
170a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par mying dang gzugs
170a3('bum): chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
170a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye da par/ mying dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi da la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
170a5('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
170a6('bum): myi dang gzugs 'dus byas grong sa zhes bya bar mi la da de/ rtsigs pa'i rgyal gyis 'dus byas stong sa nyid kya dmyigs pasbyong ba rjid kyis kyang rlom sems pa med do// dges
170a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs 'dus ma byas spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
170a8('bum): kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
170b1('bum): ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
170b2('bum): re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
170b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
170b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
170b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs rang bzhin
170b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
170b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
170b8('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par mying dang gzugs
171a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
171a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi
171a3('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
171a4('bum): paramying dang gzugs dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
171a5('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'itshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab myed par/ mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
171a6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
171a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
171a8('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
171b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bcu pa// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
171b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
171b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
171b4('bum): skye mched drug gyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ gas pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol
171b5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
171b6('bum): byas kyi dang song ba nyid kya myigs pa stong pa nyid kyis snang rnam sems su byed do// dges rab kyi pa song tu sbyind pa la spyod pa'i mi / rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid sa
171b7('bum): bskyed par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong ba zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis song pa nyid spor ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
171b8('bum): rab kyi pha rom tu phyind pa la chud pa'i mi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ske mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid sa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chus kyis
172a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
172a2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
172a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
172a4('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
172a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mched drug/ 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
172a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug
172a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
172a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
172b1('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
172b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug dor ba myed pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i chus kyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses
172b3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
172b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
172b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ma ched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
172b6('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug rang
172b7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
172b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa
173a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
173a2('bum): myed par skye mched drug dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
173a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
173a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rno/ ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
173a5('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mched drag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu/ la gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
173a6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
