173a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed parareg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
173a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
173b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
173b2('bum): reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod
173b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
173b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa chen
173b5('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rno/ ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
173b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
173b7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa
173b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
174a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
174a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
174a3('bum): parareg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
174a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pathams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
174a5('bum): byed dedamyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa ste pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
174a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
174a7('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa
174a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
174b1('bum): ma ldan pa / rnam pa thams cadas byen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi sa bya bskyed par/ reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ rtsigs pa'i chus kyis rnam thams cad stong pa nyid
174b2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa
174b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
174b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa myi dmyigs pa s+ho/ da pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
174b5('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
174b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
174b7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
174b8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
175a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed parareg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
175a2('bum): ya stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
175a3('bum): ma tho dang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ tshom pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
175a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
175a5('bum): byed dedamyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
175a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
175a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
175a8('bum): yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
175b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
175b2('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
175b3('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
175b4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
175b5('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar
175b6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
175b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
175b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha
176a1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
176a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa
176a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
176a4('bum): tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
176a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba chos tham sa cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
176a6('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
176a7('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do
176a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong par/ tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
176b1('bum): gyi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
176b2('bum): bamyed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de zhes
176b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid
176b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
176b5('bum): la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po// myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
176b6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
176b7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
176b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa
177a1('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
177a2('bum): sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
177a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
177a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa chen
177a5('bum): ba song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis ngarlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
177a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i mi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skyed pa do dam pa spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nus gyis don dam pa spong ba 'i myigs
177a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang chom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol pa du phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa 'dus
177a8('bum): byam meng ba zhes bya bar yid pa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis 'dus byas song sa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyind pas spyod
177b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
177b2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa mtha' las
177b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
177b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
177b5('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
177b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu la gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
177b7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
177b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
178a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
178a2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa rang gi mtshan
178a3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
178a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang na ba'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa myi dmyigs pa'o// da pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
178a5('bum): tshul gyis kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong / pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
178a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rmed par ngos po myed pa spyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myeng pa stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ song ba
178a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar
178a8('bum): yings byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyas kyim ngam cad slom pa nyid kya dbyigs pa/ slong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dashes rab kyi sa ma gyin pa sa spyod pa'i// rnam pa thams
178b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
178b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
178b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paralend pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
178b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ le nad pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
178b5('bum): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
178b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lend pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
178b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lend pa stong pa 'i stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
178b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
179a1('bum): khyab ce med pa chen pa grang sa zhes bya bar yangs byed pa/ dmyigs pa'i rgyas kyis can ma mas kyi kyang myigs ma mas babyed da// dag pa
179a2('bum): kyis rol tu phyin pa la spyor pa'im/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yend pa don dam pa song pa zhes bya bar srid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dzad dam pa
179a3('bum): blang ba nyid kyang dbyigs pa/ spong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab tu ma ros na byid pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i mings bya ba skyed par
179a4('bum): lend pa 'dus byas spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ gas pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dashes
179a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca/ da mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ le nad pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
179a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
179a7('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lend pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses
179a8('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lend pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
179b1('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
179b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lend pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
179b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lend pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
179b4('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
179b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ le nad pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
179b6('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par le nad pa rang gi
179b7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
179b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ le nad pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa spong
180a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
180a2('bum): myed par lend pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
180a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lend pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo
180a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
180a5('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed paralend pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bonyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
180a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
180a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
180a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
180b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs wa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
180b2('bum): srid pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
180b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
180b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyipha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa chen po
180b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis na po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
180b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
180b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa 'dus
180b8('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
181a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa
181a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa
181a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
181a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
181a5('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lastong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
181a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
181a7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
181a8('bum): pa'i rgyal gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
181b1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
181b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
181b3('bum): kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
181b4('bum): la bya ba myed par/ srid pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi da la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyi dkyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
181b5('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye/ da par/ srid pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
181b6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
181b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
181b8('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
182a1('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
182a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
182a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
182a4('bum): bya ba myed par/ skye ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
182a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba phyi nang stong // pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
182a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
182a7('bum): yid la bya ba myed par skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
182a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
182b1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba
182b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod
182b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
182b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi// pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba 'dus
182b5('bum): ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
182b6('bum): tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das
182b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
182b8('bum): skye ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
183a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor
183a2('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
183a3('bum): par/ skye ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
183a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
183a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
183a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
183a7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
183a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
183b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
183b2('bum): ro// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
183b3('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la gyod po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
183b4('bum): myed par/ skye ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya par yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
183b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
183b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang ngamyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
183b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa
183b8('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga
184a1('bum): shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/
184a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dpyis
184a3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rgashi chen po stong pa zhes
184a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
184a5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bamyed par/ rga shi don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
184a6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes
184a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyi dad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
184a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
184b1('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
184b2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
184b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rga shi thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
184b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi dor ba myed
184b5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kya nga rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184b6('bum): byind pa la spyod pa'i / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rgashi rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbyi/
184b7('bum): 5/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga ni chos thams cad
184b8('bum): slong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyi
185a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
185a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gshi myi dmyigasmra pa song ba zhes
185a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
185a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
185a5('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad maphye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi ngom
185a6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
185a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
185a8('bum): sa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
185b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom
185b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i
185b3('bum): tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmyigs la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
185b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis
185b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dbang po rnams sgom
185b6('bum): ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmyigs la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
185b7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmyigs la stobs de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
185b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag
186a1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
186a2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dge dmyigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
186a3('bum): brgyad pa des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'phags pa'i bden pa
186a4('bum): rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i ba den pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de ga gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
186a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ bsam gta na rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan
186a6('bum): de dag kyang dmyigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
186a7('bum): par/ tshad myed pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad myed pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ tshad myed pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
186a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
186b1('bum): de dag kya kyigs pa/ gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i mi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda
186b2('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed pararnam par tha rad pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ rnam par tha rad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
186b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i
186b4('bum): tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de rag kyang dmyigs la/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
186b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams car mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam pa ra tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
186b6('bum): smond pa myed pa sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ rnam par tha rad pa'i spro stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
186b7('bum): byed pa dang / smond pa myed pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
186b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187a1('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzind de dag kyang dmyigs
187a2('bum): la ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paragazungs kyi sgo
187a3('bum): rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmyigs la gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
187a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmyig
187a5('bum): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyis kyang rlom sa mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skye dpa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
187a6('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/ myigs pa'i tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ myi 'a jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
187a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang
187a8('bum): dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmyigs la so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
187b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ snying rje chen po sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang dmyigs la/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
187b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag
187b3('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
187b4('bum): bam po / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187b5('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i / de ltar thabs kyi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu dad pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la swAg
187b6('bum): par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zind cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstan pa
187b7('bum): 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdung la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i mug par srung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' seM mas
187b8('bum): dpa' chen po'i/ sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par/ byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par
188a1('bum): byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par/ byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par/
188a2('bum): byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par/ byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par
188a3('bum): byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i myi cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/
188a4('bum): 'di dag ni mnyan par myi bya'o// gzung bar myi bya'o// bcang par myi bya'o// klag par myi bya'o// kun chub par myi bya'o// dal bzhin du yid la myi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la
188a5('bum): bstand par myi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor da byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ra rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub seMs
188a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rold
188a7('bum): tu phyind pa drug la zlog cing mos pa myed par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la rtsa
188a8('bum): zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgoms pas
188b1('bum): khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las myi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa myi stond pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa'
188b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du
188b3('bum): phyi nad te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes
188b4('bum): pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag stonang to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do/
188b5('bum): gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to// zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag kyi smra myi stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su rig
188b6('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang btud sdig tocan dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni
188b7('bum): byang chub kyi sems kyang chung zad kyang myed/ khyod ni phyir myi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so zhes
188b8('bum): zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag
189a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi nad te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu myig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam
189a2('bum): ga/ bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag
189a3('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos ni bdag
189a4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni
189a5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ba dag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis song ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes
189a6('bum): pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam
189a7('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
189a8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgya nad kyis tshor
189b1('bum): ba ni bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // yid kyi 'dus
189b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mye'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
189b3('bum): rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
189b4('bum): stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam pa ra shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mying dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni bdag
189b5('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis s+ho/ ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sred pa ni dag gam bdag gis stong ngo // le nad pa ni bdag gram bdag
189b6('bum): gis stong ngo // srid pani bdag kam bdag gis spong / skye ba ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // gashrI ni bdag gam bdag gis spong // sbyin pa'i pha ro ma tu phyi dang pa ni bdag gas bdag gis spong ngo //
189b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag kam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag kam bdag gis stong
189b8('bum): ngo/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /
190a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni bdag kam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag
190a2('bum): gis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das
190a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag
190a4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ba ga gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dag gam bdag gis stong ngo / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni
190a5('bum): bdag kam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyi da ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
190a6('bum): stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni
190a7('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags
190a8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad myed pa
190b1('bum): rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar kyis gnas/
190b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa
190b3('bum): rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzind rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni
190b4('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni
190b5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na myed pa yang dag
190b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i/ bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi stond pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por
190b7('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi sa byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi nad te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs
190b8('bum): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang byed do// nyan
191a1('bum): thos zhes bya ba yang byed do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang 'og dang steng dag kyang stong ste/ rdzogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa'
191a2('bum): nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang myed/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang myed/ nyan thos shes bya ba yang myed do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston
191a3('bum): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191a4('bum): chen po'i drung du phyi nad te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su
191a5('bum): stonang pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag sbyis myi ston pa 'a ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dgazhan ya
191a6('bum): bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi nad te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams
191a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
191a8('bum): dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
191b1('bum): la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thard pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
191b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs
191b3('bum): su sgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon tu gyis shig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi stond pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
191b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig parabya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191b5('bum): chen po'i drung du phyi nang te/ 'di skad du bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas/ khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don tu bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed
191b6('bum): par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rga lag dang mgo gcad pa tshad myed pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon
191b7('bum): tu byar yod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon tu byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag myi smra myi stonang pa
191b8('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' seMs
192a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind te/ gzugs kyi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang
192a2('bum): klong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma byed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / tshor ba kyi rtag ces bya bar
192a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang /
192a4('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / 'du shes myi rtag ces bya par dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal
192a5('bum): zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces
192a6('bum): bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang
192a7('bum): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang /
192a8('bum): rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
192b1('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stonang pa dang / myig kyi rtaka ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
192b2('bum): zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya
192b3('bum): bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / rna ba kyi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba
192b4('bum): dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba rtse/ da ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / sA myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
192b5('bum): bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba
192b6('bum): dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / lce myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang
192b7('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / lus myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug

198a8('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba
198b1('bum): dang / dber zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i chus kyis stond pa dang / 'dus sa byas stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / spyod zhes bya ba
198b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi

198b4('bum): myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
198b5('bum): myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba da pa/ mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes

198b7('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces

200b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan

201a3('bum): bar 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang

201a6('bum): ces bya ba dang / smo nang pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'dra bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i chus kyis stonod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams kyi //
201a7('bum): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba/

201b2('bum): pa myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'a
201b3('bum): bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / byams pa chen po myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
