201b6('bum): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
201b7('bum): bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs
201b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stond pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag myi smra myi stond pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar
202a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sdig pa'i grogs po rnams rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o//
202a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bdun no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag rgya pa// bam po
202a3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
202a4('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan
202a5('bum): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces paka/ 'astsa la to// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
202a6('bum): chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de byang chub la yang tshig myed/ sems can la yang tshig myed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig
202a7('bum): gi don myed pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di 'di la ste/
202a8('bum): dper na/ rmyi lam na gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sbru ma la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin
202b1('bum): du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig rgyu la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste
202b2('bum): dper na chu zla la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra rnyan la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub ses
202b3('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ myig yor la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
202b4('bum): gzugs brnyan la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas
202b5('bum): myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ ga gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag pa'i mtha' la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de
202b6('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
202b7('bum): 'byorar 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan ma yin pa de
202b8('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chos nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub
203a1('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byorang
203a2('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi gnas nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na chos skyond myed pa nyid la gnas myed do//
203a3('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas myed do// tshor ba la gnas myed do// 'du shes la gnas
203a4('bum): myed do// 'du byed la gnas myed do// rnam par shes pa la ga nas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
203a5('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig la gan sa myed do// rna ba la gnas myed do// sna la gnas myed do/
203a6('bum): lce la gnas myed do// lus la gnas myed do// yid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
203a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas myed do// smra la gnas byed da dril gnas myed do// ro la gnas myed do// reg la gnas myed do//
203a8('bum): chos la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
203b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed do// bre'i rnam par shes pa'i ga
203b2('bum): myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
203b3('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gnas myed do// sna'i 'dus
203b4('bum): te reg pa'i gnas myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gnas myed ro// lus kyi dus te ga 'i gdas byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas myed do// rab kyi rang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
203b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i
203b6('bum): gnas myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gnas myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gnas myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gnas myed do//
203b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
203b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas myed do// 'du byed la gnas myed do// rnam
204a1('bum): par shes pa la gnas myed do// mying dang gzugs la gnas myed do// skye mched drug la gnas myed do// reg pa la gnas myed do// tshor ba la gnas myed do// sred pa la gnas myed do// le nad pa
204a2('bum): la gnas myed do// srid pa la gnas myed do// skye ba la gnas myed do// rga shi la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
204a3('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
204a4('bum): nasgyu ma'i skyes bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig
204a5('bum): gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig ga don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
204a6('bum): skyes bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do//
204a7('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
204a8('bum): skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
204b1('bum): bu phyirang spong ba nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gar byed do// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu song pa nyid gong ba nyings spyod pa'i tshig gidon byed do// rab 'byor 'dis me dpe rang/ rgyu ma'i skyes
204b2('bum): bu chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi dor myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
204b3('bum): bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dpar
204b4('bum): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dperan/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la
204b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
204b6('bum): bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
204b7('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
204b8('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do//
205a1('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
205a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do//
205a3('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs pa spyod pa'i tshig
205a4('bum): gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu stobs
205a5('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'dra lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta
205a6('bum): ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
205a7('bum): byind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
205a8('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do//
205b1('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par thard pa brgyad
205b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gyod pa'i tshig gi don myeng // rab 'byor da 'di lta ste
205b3('bum): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mngon par
205b4('bum): shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byo rang 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste
205b5('bum): dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
205b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myong ngo // rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do//
205b7('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod
205b8('bum): pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byord 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu snying rje chen po la
206a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang
206a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
206a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
206a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
206a5('bum): rgyas kyi tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
206a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshi ge don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes la gnas myed do//
206a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
206a8('bum): rer byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed de myed pa'i
206b1('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/
206b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang
206b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
206b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig la gan sa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
206b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
206b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi na ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'a byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
206b7('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
206b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sna la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
207a1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sde la gnas myed do//
207a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed
207a3('bum): do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus de myed pa'i phyir te/
207a4('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bya chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di
207a5('bum): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya/ nga dag par rdzogs pa'i ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid de myed pa'i phyir te/
207a6('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na
207a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub ses
207a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
207b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smra de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207b2('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dri la gnas myed do//
207b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
207b4('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro da myed pa'i phyir te/ rab
207b5('bum): 'byor de de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dang 'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor dade 'di lta ste dper na
207b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi reg la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
207b7('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
207b8('bum): kyi chos la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
208a1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir/
208a2('bum): zhe na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/
208a3('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de myed
208a4('bum): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byord
208a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna'i rnam par shes pa la ga nas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa de
208a6('bum): myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper
208a7('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
208a8('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
208b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa re myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
208b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid
208b3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
208b4('bum): pa la gyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi
208b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi ga gi 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhi na du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
208b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi na
208b7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
208b8('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do//
209a1('bum): deci'i phyir shen/ gA'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
209a2('bum): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus
209a3('bum): te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta
209a4('bum): ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas mye da do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de myed
209a5('bum): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
209a6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/
209a7('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
209a8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/
209b1('bum): xxx
209b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyin pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir she na/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba re myed pa'i phyir te/ rab
209b3('bum): de bzhinamam sems dpa' sems dpa dzin pa// shes rab kyi sa dun gyi dub sa spyod pa'i bya mas dpa ga ga da kya do// sa/ pashes
209b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par thogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna'i 'dus te da reg pa'i tshun kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// deci'i phyi nis rtswa'i 'dus te reg pa rgyud kyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir
209b5('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta
209b6('bum): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
209b7('bum): tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta
209b8('bum): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
210a1('bum): kyis tshor ba de byed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
210a2('bum): ga'abyor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
210a3('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
210a4('bum): 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de myed pa'i phyir te/
210a5('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
210a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
210a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
210a8('bum): rgyas kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mying dang gzugs la gnas myed do//
210b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mying dang gzugs de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed
210b3('bum): ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skye mched drug la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye mched drug re myed pa'i phyir te/
210b4('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
210b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg pa de myed pa'i phyi ra te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
210b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
210b7('bum): rgyas kyi tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
210b8('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sred pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sred pa
211a1('bum): de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/
211a2('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lend pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lend pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
211a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
211a4('bum): rgyas kyi srid pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
211a5('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byo rang 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skye ba la gnas myed do//
211a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
211a7('bum): 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rga shi la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sem
211a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
211b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
211b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol
211b3('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba la
211b4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
211b5('bum): pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
211b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus kyi
211b7('bum): pha rolang tu phyind pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
211b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam
212a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
212a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab
212a3('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
212a4('bum): tu phyind pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid
212a5('bum): la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
212a6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di la ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir/
212a7('bum): zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do//
212a8('bum): rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir /
212b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
212b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
212b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
212b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chen po stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
212b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor byed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
212b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi don ngas pa stong pa nyid la gnas byed do// dardzu sti zhe na/ ded ngas pa sod pa nyid myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran ro// shes pa
212b7('bum): kyi pha sod tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi dun byed do// rab 'byor 'di la skye dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'dus byas
212b8('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu myin pas
213a1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/
213a2('bum): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
213a3('bum): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha'
213a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de ba zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
213a5('bum): don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de
213a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir to// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
213a7('bum): tshig gi dor byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
213a8('bum): rar ba myed pa stong pa nyid de/ myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byeng
213b1('bum): do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de myed pa'i
213b2('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de
213b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
213b4('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
213b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir na/ na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab
213b6('bum): khyod de bzhin na kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ sa rab kyi sa momang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byung chub sems dpa'i tshig gar ni myed do// rab 'byor du 'dis me per nga / rabazhi gshegs
213b7('bum): pa sra bcom pa yangangs par rdzogs pa'i mangs rnam kyi kyi myigs pa 'ong pa nyid la gnas byed do/ 'o phyi zhen/ byigs paso pa nyid dkyang 'byor pa'in
213b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
214a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
214a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
214a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
214a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po myed pa'i
214a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
214a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
214a7('bum): kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
214a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par
214b1('bum): spong ba rnams la byed do// deci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba de dag sbed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor du de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol dan phyin pa la spyod pa'i bung
214b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i
214b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
214b4('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang po rnam sa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po de dag
214b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
214b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs de dag myed pa'i phyir te/
214b7('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/
214b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag myed pa'i phyir te/
215a1('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di
215a2('bum): ga/ lha ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi las gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
215a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
215a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i bden rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor dang
215a5('bum): bzhin cu cang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ rab kyi ma tshal na sbyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems pa'i tshig gidon byed do// rab 'byor nga 'dil

215b1('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper
215b2('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i
215b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
215b4('bum): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thard pa rnams la
215b5('bum): gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thard pa de da ka myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
215b6('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
215b7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
215b8('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
216a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam
216a2('bum): par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
216a3('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas

216a6('bum): rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

220b7('bum): sa kyi dus rin pa skye brjod pa la gnas byed do// sa kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa myed pa la gi nus myed do// rnam kyi 'du rig sakun nam tshan mangs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang bamyed pa
220b8('bum): gas byed do// lus kyi rgyas te ga pa mngan par 'du bya ba byed pa la gnas byed do// bras kyi rgyas ti ga pa 'byung babyed pa la gan byer ro// sras kyi yus na pagyi rtsigs pa la gnas byed do//
221a1('bum): rab 'byor de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba
221a2('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do//
221a3('bum): rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba

221a6('bum): tshor ba skye ba myed pa la gnas rtsod do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'gag pa myed pa la gnas med do// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byung ba

226b4('bum): bgyid pa la gnas byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi kyi gas pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa mo pa nyid skye bskyed pa la gnas myed do// gyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
226b5('bum): 'gag pa skyed pa la gnas byed do// phyi dmyigs pa spong ba nyid du nanas nyon mongs pa skyed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa man nas myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed
226b6('bum): xxx
226b7('bum): xxx
226b8('bum): nyi srung babyed pa la gnas byed do// rarab sa byed pa yo sa nyid kyi dmyigs pa la gnas byed do// rab 'byu nga ngam nyid slong ba nyid skye bamyed pa la gnas byed do// ngam nyid spong pa nyid 'gag pa myed pa
227a1('bum): gnas myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas byed do// thoza nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa la gnas myed do/ rngab nyid stong pa
227a2('bum): nyid 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
227a3('bum): pa nyid 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par
227a4('bum): 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do//
227a5('bum): rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kun nas nyon
227a6('bum): mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye gzhag pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa
227a7('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// yang dag par
227a8('bum): spong ba rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'byung ba myed
227b1('bum): pa la gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed
227b2('bum): do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nas
227b3('bum): 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de dbang po rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dbang po rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// dbang
227b4('bum): po rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dbang po rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gnas byed do// rab 'byor de stobs rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams 'gag pa myed pa la
227b5('bum): gnas myed do// spobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa gnas myed do// spobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa gnas myed do// stobs rnams
227b6('bum): 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'gag pa myed pa la
227b7('bum): gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byang
227b8('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung ba skyed pa la gnas byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gnas byed do// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do//
228a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do//
228a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs
228a3('bum): pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs
228a4('bum): pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa
228a5('bum): la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bsam gtan rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams 'gag pa myed
228a6('bum): pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams
228a7('bum): 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed
228a8('bum): do// tshad myed pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa
228b1('bum): la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzug myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
228b2('bum): 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
228b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do//
228b4('bum): rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thard pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myedado// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang /
228b5('bum): rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thard pa rna/ mas mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par
228b6('bum): thard pa rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor dam thar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams la/
228b7('bum): pamyed pa la gnas myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
228b8('bum): rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs
229a1('bum): pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
229a2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang
229a3('bum): ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
229a4('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do//
229a5('bum): rab byor mdzad par shes pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas rjed ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas myed do/ mngon par shes pa nams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa
229a6('bum): dang / rnam par byang ba skyed pa la gnas med do// mngon par shes pa nas sa su tub byed pa la gnas byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dbyigs pa
229a7('bum): la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba byed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam
229a8('bum): par byang bskyed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung ba byed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gas
229b1('bum): myed do// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba
229b2('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do//
229b3('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kun nas
229b4('bum): nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas mye da // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
229b5('bum): stobs rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin ga gas pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// / rab 'byor dmyi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas
229b6('bum): myed do// kyi 'jigs pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// kyi 'jigs pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba skyed pa la gnas byed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'acu
229b7('bum): sa kyi 'jigs pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// kyi 'jigs pa rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do//
229b8('bum): ma ma yang dag par rig pa rnams pagag pa byed pa la gnas myed do// so ma yang dag par rig pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pabyed pa dang / rnam par byang ba skyed pa la gnas myed do// ma mo yang dag par rig
230a1('bum): pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do//
230a2('bum): rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa chen po 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do//
230a3('bum): byams pa chen po mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa chen po 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa chen po myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de snying rje chen po skye ba myed
230a4('bum): pa la gnas myed do// snying rje chen po 'gag pa myed pa la gnas/ myed do// snying rje chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// snying rje chen po
230a5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// snying rje chen po 'byung nga ba myed pa la gnas myed do// snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa la ga nas myed do// rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
230a6('bum): pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang
230a7('bum): bskyed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas
230a8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la
230b1('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'du shes shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'du byed shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par shes pa shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
230b2('bum): ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di
230b3('bum): lta ste dper na/ myig shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rna ba shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sna shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lce shi ning
230b4('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lus shin tu rna ma par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// yid shin tu rna ma par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab
230b5('bum): 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems da pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper
230b6('bum): na/ gzugs shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sgra shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dri shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// ro sha ni tu
230b7('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// reg shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chos shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub
230b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa shi nad tu
231a1('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas/
231a2('bum): myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa shi nad tu
231a3('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
231a4('bum): myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ myig gi 'du sa te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mye/ da do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la
231a5('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// lce'i 'dus ter gapa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/
231a6('bum): sus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// srid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
231a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do// rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gin tu
231a8('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhin tu rnam par dag
231b1('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
231b2('bum): ma'i gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
231b3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chu'i khams shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la
231b4('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// mye'i khams shin tu rnam par da ga pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rlung gi khams shi nad tu na ma par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// nam mkha'i khams
231b5('bum): shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses
231b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ ma rig pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do//
231b7('bum): 'du byed ginang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// mying dang gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do//
231b8('bum): skye mched drug shi na tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// reg pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sred pa
232a1('bum): shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lend pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// srid pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// skye ba shi nad tu
232a2('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rga shi shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
232a3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// nas rab kyi ma rol phyid paspyod phras 'argyal
232a4('bum): bam po / rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa
232a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pazhi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa shin tu
232a6('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
232a7('bum): 'igs byed de/ shes rab kyi pa mdu sbyin shin rgyunam par dag pas mtshan sa'i gnas med do// rab 'byo de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sem pa dpa / zhes rab kyi
232a8('bum): byin pa sa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dang byed do// rab bye gis ma/ pa kyid shing tsunam par dag pa lam can ma'i gnas myed do// phyi slong pa nyid shin turnam par
232b1('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chen po stong pa nyid shind tu
232b2('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'dus ma
232b3('bum): byam grong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// thog sa dang pa sa myed pa stong pa nyid gin tu rnam par
232b4('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyi/ da shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
232b5('bum): myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shi nang tu rnam par dag pas mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin da tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// myi dmyig
232b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
232b7('bum): gnas byed do// dam po med pa'i dzim cid stong pa nyid gin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas byed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rom
232b8('bum): da pal rung pa'i bya chum sems dpa'i ngag zhi nga byed de/ 'ang byor 'dis ze yan/ dran banye bar gzhag bzhin tham par dag pa sa sam pa'i gas myed do/ ma sa
233a1('bum): shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dbang po shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do//
233a2('bum): stobs shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
233a3('bum): gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/
233a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa shini kyu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i kA/ nas myed do// bsam gtan shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chad myed pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan/
233a5('bum): ma'i gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa'i nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par rang bshin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/
233a6('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa byed pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
233a7('bum): gnas myed do// mngon par shes bzhi nas dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzidzid shin rgyarnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgrog nid tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
233a8('bum): byed do// rang byed de ba'in byang chum sems dpa' sems dang chemagyi/ shes rab gyi so sbyin pa la spong pa'i byang chum sems dpa jig gdo byed do// rab khyo 'dis ze na/
233b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shi na tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// myi 'jigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig na par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
233b2('bum): myed do// snying rje chen po ginid tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin du tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
233b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag myed pa'i phyir bdag shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la
233b4('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
233b5('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can myed pa'i phyir sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de ba zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
233b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ srog myed pa'i phyir srog shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du
233b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gso' ba myed pa'i phyir gso' ba shin
233b8('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/
234a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper dag skyes bu byed pa'i phyir skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
234a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gang zag myed pa'i phyir/ gang zag shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do//
234a3('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ shed can myed pa'i
234a4('bum): phyir shed can shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
234a5('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ shed bdag myed pa'i phyir shed bdag shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la ma tshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub
234a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ byed pa po myed pa'i phyir byed pa po shinang tu rnam
234a7('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
234a8('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
234b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ shes pa po myed pa'i phyir she ba po shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor/
234b2('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da lta ste dper na/ mthong ba po myed pa'i phyir mthong ba
234b3('bum): po shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/
234b4('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon pa/ ra 'char ba'i tshe mun pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de/ bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
234b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems da pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i mye 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
234b6('bum): cad kyi gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
234b7('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seMs
234b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
235a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
235a2('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chald pa'i gnas myed do//
235a3('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
235a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas myed do/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
235a5('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
235a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
235a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
235a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang skar ma dang nor bu rin po che dang / glog
235b1('bum): gi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di la
235b2('bum): ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
235b3('bum): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
235b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi 'od del gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
235b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od
235b6('bum): la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste
235b7('bum): dper na/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas byed do// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
235b8('bum): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
236a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi'ong la gnas myed do// rab 'byor dade bzhin/
