236a2('bum): gtu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi
236a3('bum): 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta
236a4('bum): ste dper na tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gan sa myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
236a5('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'a byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
236a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor du 'di lta ste dper na/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do//
236a7('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chung
236a8('bum): snang gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
236b1('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ chad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang
236b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
236b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
236b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab
236b5('bum): 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na / tshad
236b6('bum): myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do//
236b7('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
236b8('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
237a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
237a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do//
237a3('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ gnas gtsang ma'i
237a4('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin da du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
237a5('bum): don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237a6('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
237a7('bum): kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// de ci'i phyir
237a8('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan
237b1('bum): ba yang ma yin te/ gzugs myed pa bstan tu myed pa thogs myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
237b2('bum): kyi myed pa yang dag pa nyid bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/
237b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/
237b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos tham sa cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang myi dge ba dang / lung du bstan da pa dang / lung du ma bstand pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang
237b5('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / ga pa skyed pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / nam tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang /
237b6('bum): thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad ni myed pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//
237b7('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtend pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan
237b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni par shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa/ sbyin
238a1('bum): ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi ma dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang /
238a2('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rtend pa'i 'du shes dgu ste / 'di ltar rnam par bas pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bru can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par dgas pa'i 'dugs dang / rnam par dmar ba'i
238a3('bum): shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor pa'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rtend pa'i bsam gtan bzhi
238a4('bum): rang / chad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rtend pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
238a5('bum): chos rjes su drang pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su drang pa dang / tshul ni mas rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / la rjes su drad pa dang / dbugs kyi nang du rtsub rjes su dran pa dang / lus
238a6('bum): kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtend pa'i chos myi dge ba gang lags
238a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi dge ba'o// rab 'byor ngam byin par le nad pa ni 'jig rten pa'i
238a8('bum): chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor nga 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi dge ba'o// rab 'byor nga bsnyun tu smra ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor da phra ma ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos
238b1('bum): kyi dge ba'o// rab 'byor ni gcod pa'i 'jig da mamams kyi dge ba'o// rab 'byor ni gargyal pa'i 'jig rten du'i chos kyi dge na/ rab 'byos chag sa sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi dge na
238b2('bum): rab 'byor de gnod sems ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor de log par lta ba ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// khro ba dang mdud par 'dzind pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe
238b3('bum): ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de de dag ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstand pa'i chos gang lags/
238b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma/ bstand pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// yi/ dkyi las ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni
238b5('bum): lung du ma bstand pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstand pa 'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// gzugs kyi da pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// phung po rnams
238b6('bum): ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// khams rnams ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstand pa'o// rnam par sbyind pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstand te/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan
238b7('bum): pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched
238b8('bum): bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
239a1('bum): 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/ de ma yin pa 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa
239a2('bum): 'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
239a3('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo mtshan ma myed pa dang /
239a4('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo smond pa myed pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas
239a5('bum): pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang /
239a6('bum): dran ka shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par tha rad pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i
239a7('bum): 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par tha rad pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
239a8('bum): las 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
239b1('bum): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
239b2('bum): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar da pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ nung myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
239b3('bum): par tha rad pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mche da la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa bdun pa'o//
239b4('bum): de nam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed byin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o//
239b5('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang ba
239b6('bum): ba dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/
239b7('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa myed pa rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de
239b8('bum): dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang
240a1('bum): rnams pa'o zhes brjod pa rtse/ dga' ba byed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang mid kyi bdeb
240a2('bum): nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang kyed sdug bsngal pa yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las
240a3('bum): 'de dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams grub par gyur cing ga snga tshogs kyi 'du zhes yid la rtsi byed pas/ rnam sa 'a'amaba' sas mo zhis thenam sa'a'amatha' mas skye ma ched pa nye bar 'asgrubs te gnas so//
240a4('bum): denas pa lam pa canams 'a'amapa 'alas skye la ched labadag par 'das te/ ma pa shes pas sa sa pa sgosams/ dmama'asas skyes rnas nyo
240a5('bum): bams par byan ma shes mapa' las snye mamed ma yang dag par 'das te/ byung bdam med dronas te spyang bar byed pa'i sgo mamed pa te bar bsgrubs te gnapa so// de nim pa mas da durung ba rtsog
240a6('bum): pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes byed 'du shes byed sbyin skyem med la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dernam pa thams cad du 'dugs med dreshes byed sbyin skyes ched las yang dag par 'das te/
240a7('bum): 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku po de dag dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
240a8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog sa dang tha ma myed
240b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
240b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
240b3('bum): brgyad dag ste// de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag dang bcas pa'i chos ga #// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de zag
240b4('bum): ba dang banas pa'i chos shes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis pa dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i
240b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags
240b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor zag pa myed pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
240b7('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
240b8('bum): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
241a1('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos
241a2('bum): gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma
241a3('bum): yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
241a4('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags dpa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa ba zhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
241a5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu
241a6('bum): phyi nad pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
241a7('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/
241a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba myed cing / 'jig pa myed pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myed pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa
241b1('bum): zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nord pa de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings chos skyond myed pa nyid/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha'
241b2('bum): ste/ rab 'byor de de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da thun mong gi chos
241b3('bum): shes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos shes bya'o//
241b4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos ga nga lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar
241b5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
241b6('bum): ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
241b7('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
241b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas
242a1('bum): ra gsun nyid kyis byu ba'i chos thams cad la rtog paskyed pas chags par gyi rgya// chos sa sacu ga nyis su med pa'i nus kyis rtog bskyed cing / rnam par rtog pa skyed pa
242a2('bum): phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242a3('bum): chen po zhes bgyi ba/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed
242a4('bum): par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems da / pa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul byang chub
242a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po nges pa gang lags// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de sems can gyi
242a6('bum): phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed
242a7('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar ste/ rab 'byor dade de ni sems can gyi phung nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems
242a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o//
242b1('bum): gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
242b2('bum): 'khor dpag tu myed par sems can thams cad kyi don tu bdag gis go tsa bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems
242b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems
242b4('bum): can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa myed pas chos tha mas cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams
242b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o//
242b6('bum): bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu myed pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor da de ni byang
242b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/
242b8('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend pa'i sems can ji snyed cig
243a1('bum): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gis don tu bdag gi nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la
243a2('bum): ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don tu yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus
243a3('bum): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thos
243a4('bum): cad kyi don tu sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa mya ngan ga las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams
243a5('bum): cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas bzod pa dag gi don tu dge ba'i ma bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba zag zhig brgyaskyong dums byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsregs te/ tha ma rjed
243a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/
243a7('bum): de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243a8('bum): posartag tu rgyu nad myi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems brlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243b1('bum): po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyind chang 'dod chags kyi sems myi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems kyi skyed/ gti mug gi sems myi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems kyi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems myi skyed
243b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// res sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su kyi
243b3('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myi sku la pa'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi skul pa ni/ rnam
243b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing / de sa rlom sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi sku lad pa'o// des seMs
243b5('bum): can thams cad kyi phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
243b6('bum): sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong la/ des rlom
243b7('bum): sems su 'gyur ba myed pa ste/ rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i
243b8('bum): tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o/
244a1('bum): chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer myed pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos
244a2('bum): te/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la
244a3('bum): yon tan tu lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing / mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtson pa
244a4('bum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//
244a5('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa
244a6('bum): nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las
244a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid
244a8('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnaste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung
244b1('bum): po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang
244b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
244b3('bum): gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad myed pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la gnas/
244b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/
244b5('bum): ting nge 'dzind nams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gan sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa
244b6('bum): rnams la gnas byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
244b7('bum): gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rin cen phyag/
244b8('bum): rgya'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ zla ba rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzind la gnas chos thams cad las shi nad tu
245a1('bum): 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
245a2('bum): nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
245a3('bum): la gnas/ 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug
245a4('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'ju/ dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa zhes bya ba'i
245a5('bum): ting nge 'dzi ring la gnas/ nyam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gan sa/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i
245a6('bum): ting nge 'dzidi la gnas rnardza'i kyil 'khor kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dbyung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ dbang po 'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzid la gnas/ rgyun byings su song ba'i
245a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par springs pa'i ting nge 'dzinid la gnas/ snrel bana'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas
245a8('bum): chol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la rten pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas
245b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ dga' ba byed
245b2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad kyi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi'i brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa
245b3('bum): dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ 'jig pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nyi ma sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ zla ba dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ shes
245b4('bum): rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gyi
245b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind
245b6('bum): la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
245b7('bum): chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas
245b8('bum): yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mying nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge
246a1('bum): 'dzind la gnas/ gnas pa myed par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rab rib myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ g.yo ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas
246a2('bum): yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ sems myed par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting
246a3('bum): nge 'dzind la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos thams cad las
246a4('bum): 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ yongs su gcod par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nem nur rnam par seld pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ gnas su bya ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
246a5('bum): la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gan sa rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas
246a6('bum): rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral
246a7('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams
246a8('bum): cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba chos thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
246b1('bum): gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par seld pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind
246b2('bum): la gnas/ 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin
246b3('bum): la gnas/ klog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgya nad chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind la gnas/
246b4('bum): rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon
246b5('bum): mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gan sa/ gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa'i ting nge
246b6('bum): 'dzind la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyurd pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas
246b7('bum): rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor de chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
246b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sems can gyi phung po chen po'i nges pa'i phul byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// /
247a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di
247a2('bum): skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
247a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu don gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can
247a4('bum): rnams la chos stond pa dang / sems can tu lta ba rab tu spang da pa dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab da tu spang ba dang / gso' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur
247a5('bum): lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu smra nga ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba
247a6('bum): por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang yongs su thong pa por lta ba rab tu snang ba dang 'o ba tho sa par btus chor du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par/
247a7('bum): lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / myed par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lnga
247a8('bum): ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyind par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dran pa
247b1('bum): nye bar gzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang
247b2('bum): chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad myed par lta
247b3('bum): ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spong ba dang / rnam par tha rad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par
247b4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa/ myed par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzind tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs
247b5('bum): kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / myi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
247b6('bum): byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smyind par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
247b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta pa rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun tu lta ba rab tu spang
247b8('bum): ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos stond pa bgyid kyang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de
248a1('bum): de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha
248a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin
248a3('bum): rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// myig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin
248a4('bum): yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin// gzugs su lta bar 'gyur nga ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur pa yin/ driri lta bar 'gyur ba yi/ da na/ ror lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
248a5('bum): chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig gi rnam par shes paralta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyurar ba yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
248a6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// myig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i
248a7('bum): 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te
248a8('bum): reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
248b1('bum): kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
248b2('bum): tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mye'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
248b3('bum): nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin// ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par
248b4('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mying dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par
248b5('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lend par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur pa yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad
248b6('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin
248b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind par 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
248b8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
249a1('bum): du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
249a2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'gyur pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi dmyigs
249a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
249a4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'a gyur pa yin/ dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stobs su
249a5('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyurar ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta b.ra'agyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba
249a6('bum): yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad myed par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par tha rad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mthar
249a7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur/
249a8('bum): ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
249b1('bum): ma mo yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yid/ byams pa chen por smra bar 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems
249b2('bum): can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
249b3('bum): chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
249b4('bum): 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod cing thabs kyi khas pas gzugs su dmyigs shing / dmyigs pa'i tshul
249b5('bum): gyis lnga bskyed do// tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyig pa'i tshul gyi sa lta ba skyed do// 'du shes su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i
249b6('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// myig tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
249b7('bum): do// snar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lcer dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// lus su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid du dmyigs shing dmyigs
249b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sgrar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// drir dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/
250a1('bum): ror dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// reg tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// chos su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// myig gi rnam par shes
250a2('bum): par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lce'i rnam
250a3('bum): par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
250a4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing
250a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi 'a dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do
250a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te rdeg par dmyigs ni dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis sa bskyed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis la bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar
250a7('bum): TIgs gi dbyigs pa'i rgyas kyis smra bskyed do// gA'i 'dus ti ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar dmyigs gi myigs pa'i dus kyis ka bskyed do// blo'i 'dus te rig pa'i nang kyis tshor bar dmyigs shi dbyigs
250a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
250b1('bum): lnga bskyed do// pa'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sa bskyed do// chu'i khams su dbyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// mye'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis smra ba skyed
250b2('bum): do// rlung gi khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// nam mkha'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul
250b3('bum): kyis lta ba skyed do// ma rig par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
250b4('bum): mying dang gzugs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// skye mched drug tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
250b5('bum): do/ tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sred par dmyigs shing dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// la nad par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
250b6('bum): srid par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// skye bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rga shir dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinapa
250b7('bum): par dbyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rdul khrims kyi pha ro lad tu byin par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang por dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i chus kyis snyas
250b8('bum): skyed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
251a1('bum): par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// phyi stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// phyi nang
251a2('bum): stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chen po stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
251a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
251a4('bum): skyed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs zhing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dor ba
251a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skye da do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing /
251a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po
251a7('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i
251a8('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yang dag par spong bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmyigs
251b1('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dbang por dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// stobs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmyigs shing dmyis
251b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'phags pa'i bden par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan
251b3('bum): tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshad myed par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
251b4('bum): rnam par tha rad par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga ba skyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dkur dmyi gas shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar
251b5('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// mdza na bar shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do
251b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// gzungs kyi skor dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lci bskyed do/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i spobs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul
251b7('bum): kyis lta bskyed do// kyi 'jigs par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// so so yang dag par rig par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis lnga bskyed do// byams pa chen por dmyigs shing dmyigs
251b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snying rje chen por dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sems can yongs
252a1('bum): su sbyind par bya bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byang chub tu dmyigs shing
252a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dge 'dun du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul
252a3('bum): khyim lta bskyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmyigs shing myi gas pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan parang
252a4('bum): 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lwa ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes
252a5('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir gyig tu lta bar 'gyurab yin/ na bar sa pa dang / sngar smra ba dang / ler lnga ba dang / lus mu lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de
252a6('bum): phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skur lta ba dang / dri lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir myig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ na ba'i
252a7('bum): rnam par gas par lta ba dang // lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bu dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur
252a8('bum): ba yin / na ba'i 'dus ga par lta ba dang / rtswa'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / kwa'i 'dus te nges par lta pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'gyur ba yin/
252b1('bum): phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
252b2('bum): kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin
252b3('bum): chu'i khams su lta ba dang / mye'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur
252b4('bum): bu yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / mying dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang /
252b5('bum): le nad par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
252b6('bum): phyi nad par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par lta bar
252b7('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam
252b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
253a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du
253a2('bum): lta ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur
253a3('bum): ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir
253a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan da tu lta ba dang / tshad myed par lta ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyom/ sa par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par tha rad par lta ba dang /
253a5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rna ma par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond par myed par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang
253a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin tu lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang /
253a7('bum): snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir sems can yongs su smyind par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar
253a8('bum): lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de la
253b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi ma rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma/ thabs ma'as pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ myi dbyigs pa'i rdul khyim ma mno to// den
253b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o//
253b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang
253b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de
253b5('bum): 'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis
253b6('bum): shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangasu mchi'o//
253b7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam
253b8('bum): ba dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
254a1('bum): sems dang po bskyed phyin cad/ chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'gag pa dang 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
254a2('bum): byang bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba myed cing / 'gag pa myed pa dang 'phel ba myed cing 'grib pa myed pa dang / 'ong ba byed cing 'gro ba myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
254a3('bum): pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa de la nyan thos kyi sems myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems myed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do// tshe dang /
254a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems myed
254a5('bum): // smras pa me dang ldan pa rab 'byor dgang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems zag pa myed pa 'ongs su chud bskyed pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa myed do zhes smras
254a6('bum): pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// 'du shes kyang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed
254a7('bum): ro// myig kyang chags pa myed do// rna ba yang chags pa myed do// sna yang chags pa myed do// lce yang chags pa myed do// lus kyang chags pa myed do// yid kyang chags pa myed do// gzugs kyang chags pa myed
254a8('bum): sgra yang chags pa byed do// dri yang chags pa byed do// ro yang chags pa byed do// reg kyang chags pa myed do// chos kyang chags pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par
254b1('bum): shes pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do//
254b2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags
254b3('bum): ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
254b4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg
254b5('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sa'i khams rgya nga chags pa yang myed do// chu'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// mye'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyang chags pa
254b6('bum): myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// mying
254b7('bum): dang gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// skye mched drug kyang chags pa myed do// reg pa yang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa med do// sred pa yang chags pa myed do// lend pa yang chags pa myed do//
254b8('bum): srid pa yang chags pa myed do// skye ba yang chags pa myed do// rga shi yang chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do//
255a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skyed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags
255a2('bum): pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed
255a3('bum): do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do//
255a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang bzhin ste/ nga pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
255a5('bum): kyang chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// ngo bo nyid
255a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa myed do//
255a7('bum): rtswa 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyang chags pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi san lag rnams kyang chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam
255a8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa byed do// bsam gtan nams kyang chags pa byed do// chad myed pa rnams kyang chags pa byed do// gzugs myed pa'i
255b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong
255b2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yang chags pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind nams kyang chags pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa myed
255b3('bum): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po yang chags
255b4('bum): pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rnam pa thos
255b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rab 'byoradakyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa myed do//
255b6('bum): 'du shes kyang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// myig kyang chags pa myed do// rna ba yang chags pa myed do// sna yang chags pa myed do// lce
255b7('bum): yang chags pa myed do// lus kyang chags pa myed do// yid kyang chags pa myed do// gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// sgra yang chags pa myed do// dri yang chags pa myed do// ro yang chags pa myed do/
255b8('bum): reg kyang chags pa myed do// chos kyang chags pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do//
256a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed dog/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/
256a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
256a3('bum): yang chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang
256a4('bum): chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
256a5('bum): kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sa'i khams kyang chag sa pa myed do// chu'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// mye'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyang chags pa myed do//
256a6('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do//
256a7('bum): mying dang gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// skye mched drug kyang chags pa myed do// reg pa yang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sred pa yang chags pa myed do// lend pa yang chags pa myed do//
256a8('bum): srid pa yang chags pa myed do// skye ba yang chags pa myed do// rga shi yang chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do//
256b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyin pa yang chags pa byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sang
256b2('bum): chags pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang
256b3('bum): chags pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags
256b4('bum): pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa skye do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa
256b5('bum): nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi/ nga chags pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa mye/ da do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do//
256b6('bum): pho nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyi de stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang tshogs pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa myed do//
256b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyang chags pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam
256b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i
257a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa'i
257a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang chags pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang chags pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa
257a3('bum): myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po yang chags pa myed
257a4('bum): ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa skye do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams
257a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyend pa nyi/ da kyi sems de yang zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do//
257a6('bum): zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// nyan thos
257a7('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa de yin te/
257a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
257b1('bum): zag pa byed cing 'ongs su chud pa myed do// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing / 'ongs su chud pa myed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin
257b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// tshor
257b3('bum): ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyu zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
257b4('bum): zag pa myed cing 'ongs su chud pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing yongs su chud pa myed do// myig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa
257b5('bum): myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing 'ongs
257b6('bum): su chud pa myed do// lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed ning khongs su chud pa myed do// lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// yid kyang rang bzhin
257b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// smra yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed
257b8('bum): cing khongs su chud pa myed do// dri yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing 'ongs su chud pa myed do// ro yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// reg kyang rang

258a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par she sa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// myig gi/
258a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa
258a6('bum): myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa

258a8('bum): myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa
258b1('bum): nyid kyi phyirazag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend

259a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su
259a3('bum): chung ba skyed do// rga shi yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing 'ongs su chud pa byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing yongs su chud ba myed do//
259a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi/ ra/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha ro// lang tu phyind pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa
259a5('bum): myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing 'ongs su chud pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang
259a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rang
259a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
259a8('bum): zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed/
259b1('bum): cing khongs su chud pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing longs/
259b2('bum): su chud pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing 'ongs
