259b4('bum): cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang ba zhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa
259b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa
259b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// ngo bo
259b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing yongs su chud pa myed do//
259b8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa
260a1('bum): rtsed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi kyi zag pa myed cing 'ongs su chud pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin spong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing yongs su
260a2('bum): chud pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed
260a3('bum): ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing
260a4('bum): khongs su chud pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhi na stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed
260a5('bum): cing khongs su chud pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rnam par thard pa rnams
260a6('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa
260a7('bum): myed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang
260a8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang
260b1('bum): bzhin thong ba nyid kyi phying/ zag ma byed cing 'ongs su sun pa byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams kyang rang bzhi spong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa byed cing 'ongs su chud pa byed do/ myi 'jigs pa rnams/
260b2('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// snying rje chen po
260b3('bum): yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// thams cad
260b4('bum): shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa skye dad cing khongs su chud pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nga rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud
260b5('bum): pa myed do rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do//
260b6('bum): bam po / rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras
260b7('bum): pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'du shes kyang rang
260b8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
261a1('bum): zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// myig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud
261a2('bum): ba myed do// sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

264a3('bum): khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems myed pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa myed do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa myed do//
264a4('bum): tshor ba myed pa yang tshor ba la chags pa myed do// 'du shes myed pa yang 'du shes la chags pa myed do// 'du byed myed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa
264a5('bum): la chags pa myed do// myig myed pa yang myig la chag sa pa myed do// rna ba myed pa yang rna ba la chags pa myed do// sna myed pa yang sna la chags pa myed do// lce myed pa yang lce la

264b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do//

264b3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa
264b4('bum): myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mye da pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do//
264b5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba tshor ba chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang rna ba'i 'dus
264b6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
264b7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
264b8('bum): ba la mtha pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// sa'i khams myed pa yang sa'i khams la
265a1('bum): chags pa myed do// chu'i khams myed pa yang chu'i khams la chags pa myed do// mye'i khams myed pa yang mye'i khams la chags pa myed do// rlung gi khams myed pa yang rlung gi khams la chags
265a2('bum): bskyed do// nam mkha'i khams myed pa yang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa yang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa myed do// ma rig pa myed pa yang
265a3('bum): ma rig pa la chags pa myed do// 'du byed byed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa byed do// mying dang gzugs myed pa yang mying dang gzugs la
265a4('bum): chags pa myed do// skye mched drug myed pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa myed do// reg pa myed pa yang reg pa la chags pa rtse dad do// tshor ba myed pa yang tshor ba la chags pa myed do/
265a5('bum): sred pa myed pa yang sred pa la chags pa myed do// lend pa rgya dpa yang lend pa la chags pa myed do// srid pa myed pa yang srid pa la chags pa myed do// skye ba myed pa yang skye ba la chags
265a6('bum): pa myed do// rga shi myed pa yang rga shi la chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa
265a7('bum): yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed
265a8('bum): pa yang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol
265b1('bum): tu phyind pa myed pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa
265b2('bum): myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid myed pa yang chen po stong
265b3('bum): pa nyid la chags pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// 'dus ma
265b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang ma tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// thog
265b5('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do//
265b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa yang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
265b7('bum): myed pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa skyed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa spyod pa nyid myed pa yang dngom po
265b8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
266a1('bum): nyid la chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba myed pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa myed/
266a2('bum): ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa myed do// dbang po myed pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa myed do// stobs myed pa yang stobs rnams la chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi
266a3('bum): yan lag myed pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
266a4('bum): myed pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa myed do// bsam gtan myed pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa myed do// chad myed myed 'chad myed pa rnams la chags pa myed do//
266a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang gzugs rtse dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa myed pa yang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags
266a6('bum): pamyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
266a7('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la chags pa myed do// mngon par shes pa myed pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags
266a8('bum): pa byed do// ting nge 'dzin myed pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa yang de bzhin
266b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa myed pa yang myi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa myed/
266b2('bum): ngo/ byams pa chen po myed pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po myed pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
266b3('bum): rnams la chags pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid myed pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chag pa myed do// rnam pa thams
266b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la chags pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti/ 'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chag
266b5('bum): pa myed do// tshor ba myed pa yang tshor ba la chags pa myed do// 'du shes myed pa yang 'du shes la chags pa myed do// 'du byed myed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa myed
266b6('bum): pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// myig myed pa yang myig la chags pa myed do// rna ba myed pa yang rna ba la chags pa myed do// sna myed pa yang sna la chags pa myed do// lce myed pa yang lce la chags
266b7('bum): pamyed do// lus myed pa yang lus la chags pa myed do// yid myed pa yang yid la chags pa myed do// gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa myed do// smra myed pa yang smra la chags pa myed do// dri myang
266b8('bum): pa yang dri la chags pa myed do// ro myed pa yang ro la chags pa myed do// reg myed pa yang reg la chags pa myed do// chos myed pa yang chos la chags pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa
267a1('bum): yang myig gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang sna'i rnam par shes pa
267a2('bum): myed pa la chags pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// yid kyi rnam
267a3('bum): par shes pa myed pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang myig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te
267a4('bum): reg pa la chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa ya nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// lus
267a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa la chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa
267a6('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba 'i tshor ba myed pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
267a7('bum): ba la chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang / lce'i
267a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bskyed pa yang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te
267b1('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do// sa'i khams myed pa yang sa'i khams la chags pa myed do// chu'i khams myed pa yang chu'i khams la chags
267b2('bum): pa myed do// mye'i khams myed pa yang mye'i 'ams la chags pa myed do// rlung gi khams myed pa yang rlung gi khams la chags pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams myed pa yang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa myed do//
267b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa yang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa myed do// ma rig pa myed pa yang ma rig pa la chags pa myed do// 'du byed myed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa myed do// rnam par
267b4('bum): shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// dmying dang gzugs myed pa yang mying dang gzugs la chags pa myed do// skye mched drug myed pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa myed/
267b5('bum): do// reg pa myed pa yang reg pa la chags pa myed do// tshor ba mye ra pa yang tshor ba la chags pa myed do// sred pa yang sred pa la cha gas pa myed do// lend pa myed pa yang lend pa la chags
267b6('bum): pa myed do// srid pa myed pa yang srid pa la chags pa myed do// skye ba myed pa yang skye ba la chags pa myed do// rga shi myed pa yang rga shi la chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang sbyin pa'i
267b7('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad pa la chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha ro yid tu phyind partsod pa yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la chags pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rog tu phyind pa med pa yang bzod pa'i
267b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// brtsod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyidang pa byed pa yang
268a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid myed pa
268a2('bum): yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa
268a3('bum): yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid myed pa yang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// 'dus
268a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang 'dus ma bya/ sa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa
268a5('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chag sa pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa la nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do//
268a6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa yang
268a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la
268a8('bum): chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// dngos po
268b1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid byed pa yang / dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa myed do// yang dag
268b2('bum): par spong ba myed pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa myed do// dbang po myed pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa myed
268b3('bum): do// stobs myed pa yang stobs rnams la chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa yang 'phags
268b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa myed do// 'phag pa'i bden pa myed pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa myed do// bsam gtan myed pa yang bsam gtan rnams la
268b5('bum): chags pa myed do// tshad myed pa bye yang tshad myed pa rnams la cha gas pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye/ da pa yang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
268b6('bum): chags pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa skyed pa yang rnam par thab rad pa rnams la chags pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
268b7('bum): ba rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa
268b8('bum): la chags pa myed do// mngon par shes pa myed pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind myed pa yang ting nge 'dzind rnams la chags pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa yang gzungs
269a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams la chags pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa myed pa yang myi 'jigs pa rnaMs
269a2('bum): la chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa myed do// byams pa chen po myed pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po
269a3('bum): myed pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid myed pa yang thams
269a4('bum): cang shes pa nyid la chags pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed pa yang rnam pa
269a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la chags pa myed do// che du nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod
269a6('bum): pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i se mas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mo nga ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmyigs pa
269a7('bum): myed pa'i tshul gyis rlom mis su 'gyur ba myed/ mngon par chags par 'gyur ba myed pas// de 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang
269a8('bum): ki bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi'i srad tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skyed
269b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ gang po khyod kyi spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni go ca chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
269b2('bum): de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269b3('bum): po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269b4('bum): pos ko na chen po rtse bgos zhes bya/ gang thos smras pa/ me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi me zhig kyi don du
269b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu skye/ na ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su
269b6('bum): gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi ci'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu tshul khrims kyi pha lad tu phyin pa
269b7('bum): la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i
269b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / bzod pa bsgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams
270a1('bum): cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan bskyed
270a2('bum): pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan bskyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing
270a3('bum): shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po
270a4('bum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar myi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed
270a5('bum): cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni / byang chub tu dgod par myi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pa sa go tsa myi gon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270a6('bum): chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyond to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad
270a7('bum): kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skur
270a8('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha ro la tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus
270b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par/
270b2('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab
270b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su
270b4('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong
270b5('bum): pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang
270b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can tham sa cad kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
270b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar
270b8('bum): bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong
271a1('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
271a2('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dor ba myed
271a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos
271a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
271a5('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thos
271a6('bum): cad kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o//
271a7('bum): bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
271a8('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad
271b1('bum): kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi
271b2('bum): rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o//
271b3('bum): bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems cad thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan
271b4('bum): lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thamasadakyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o//
271b5('bum): bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas/
271b6('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang chad byed pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshad kyang pa rnams la gnas par byar
271b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang tshad myed pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
271b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mthar kyis/
272a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thard pa'i
272a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la sbyar
272a3('bum): bar bya'o// bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams la gnas
272a4('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs
272a5('bum): kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la snu
272a6('bum): bar bya'o// bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la sgyu ra bar bya'o// bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
272a7('bum): la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen
272a8('bum): po la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar
272b1('bum): sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
272b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi
272b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
272b4('bum): chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
272b5('bum): pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa
272b6('bum): yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don yongs su myi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin
272b7('bum): ba yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
272b8('bum): tha'i 'i la byabs/ sbyin pa yongs su gtor na chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mom pa rten pa 'dir byeng chum sems dpa' sems dpa chen po/ zhes rab kyi 'om phyid pal myo 'i/
272'a1('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong
272'a2('bum): ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
272'a3('bum): khyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i
272'a4('bum): tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmyig sa pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
272'a5('bum): ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mya 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i
272'a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin
272'a7('bum): tha yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigaso// gtong ba ya
272'a8('bum): myi dmyigs le nad pa yang myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol
272'b1('bum): tu phyind pa'i go tsa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de dag la
272'b2('bum): mtshan mar myi byed cing / myi dmyigs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i go ca chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
272'b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de
272'b4('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272'b5('bum): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i spyi na ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272'b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa myi skye'an/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la
272'b7('bum): la smos kyang myi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
272'b8('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs
273a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang mo pa dang / rten
273a2('bum): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
273a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed cing / brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ses/
273a4('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273a5('bum): po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing gan sa pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go rgya
273a6('bum): 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
273a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rald tu phyand pa la spyad pa'/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
273a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
273b1('bum): chung pa'i cha/ chos thams cad sbru mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su myi byed de/ rang bzhin rlong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang kyi dmyigs shing / dge ba'i/
273b2('bum): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi
273b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod
273b4('bum): pa ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug mo thams cad yongs su 'jind te/ de'i phyir gon chen po bgos shes bya'o// ched nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
273b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
273b6('bum): yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/
273b7('bum): byang dub sems dpa'i sems dpa' tshan po/ brjod pa'i ma la tu sbyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i ma ma tu kyi dpa'o// tshe dang ldan pagar na ci'i thugananasang byang chub sems dpa'
273b8('bum): rab chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos da nga ngas rgyam dang ldan pa'i yi la byabs ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yongs bya
274a1('bum): tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
274a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274a3('bum): bo/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag la/ bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rtend pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274a4('bum): po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa'i sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
274a5('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
274a6('bum): cing / brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
274a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i song la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
274a8('bum): pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan
274b1('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
274b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su myi byed cing bzod pa myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
274b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol
274b4('bum): tu phyind pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzind te/ de'i phyi ra go ca chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274b5('bum): po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yi na gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
274b6('bum): bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
274b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
274b8('bum): brtson 'grus pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims
275a1('bum): srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang
275a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pas yid la bya bas
275a3('bum): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang rtend pa 'di ni byang chub
275a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
275a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan ba'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ra ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi
275a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed cing / brtun myi ngas pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi
275a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
275a8('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/
275b1('bum): ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
275b2('bum): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su myi byed cing / brtson
275b3('bum): 'grus de yang myi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
275b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
275b5('bum): tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug thams cad yongs su 'dzind te/ de'i phyir go ca chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
275b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
275b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
275b8('bum): sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
276a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa zas
276a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
276a3('bum): tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa' la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
276a4('bum): dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
276a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
276a6('bum): mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan
276a7('bum): bsha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/
276a8('bum): la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par
276b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
276b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmyig
276b3('bum): pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mya 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang
276b4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
276b5('bum): dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes te/ bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su myi
276b6('bum): byed cing / bsam gtan de yang myi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba
276b7('bum): 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam
276b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzind te/ de'i phyir gon chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
277a1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams
277a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i/ sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed
277a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang
277a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
277a5('bum): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i ma pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/
277a6('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
277a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
277a8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
277b1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
277b3('bum): brtson 'grus nyam par gyi byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
277b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
277b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig
277b6('bum): tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i
277b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu ma
277b8('bum): byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
278a1('bum): tu phyind pa la rlom sems su myi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni shes
278a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
278a3('bum): kyis/ pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mar myi byed/ myi dmyigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
278a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi go tsa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha da ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyind pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyind pa
278a5('bum): drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs
278a6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar myi byed do// bsam gtan dang
278a7('bum): tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang myi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang myi skye'o//
278a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thabs mkhas pa dang / 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
278b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mthong /
278b2('bum): bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gis dbang gis kyang myi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang myi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang zil kyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang
278b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs mkhas pa'i go ca chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
278b4('bum): go ca chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//
278b5('bum): bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
278b6('bum): dpa' chen po de ltar go tsa bgos pa la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /
278b7('bum): mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gon chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs
278b8('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par bye'o zhes spa rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyid dag na/ sangs rgyas
279a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa/ ched du rjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten kyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go \u0f7f
279a2('bum): chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/
279a3('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa/ ched du rjod cing mying yongs su smog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rtend gyi 'ams/
279a4('bum): che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin pa dar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
279a5('bum): ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
279a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du rjod pa ched du rjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rtenang gi khams me ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
279a7('bum): po/ gon chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing
279a8('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// bya na ra kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
279b1('bum): ched du rjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed
279b2('bum): do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// shard lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
279b3('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du rjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems
279b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go ca chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis
279b5('bum): rnam par rtse'o zhes smra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten kyi 'ams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
279b6('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / mying yo ngas su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go tsa chen po
279b7('bum): bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go//
279b8('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa/ ched du rjod cing mying yongs su
280a1('bum): sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do//
280a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
280a3('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rtend gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa'
280a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhi ga sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
280a5('bum): rtse'o zhes smra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa
280a6('bum): rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rtend gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go ca chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
280a7('bum): sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// smras pa tshe dang
280a8('bum): ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la sna dag par bzhugs shes bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin
280b1('bum): gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge
280b2('bum): ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog
280b3('bum): pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde
280b4('bum): ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba
280b5('bum): lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis/ de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum
280b6('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa/
280b7('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shind tu yangs pa kyi gnyis pa/ chad myed pa gzugs myed pa/
280b8('bum): gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shi nang tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
281a1('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gzugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa/ lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzog
281a2('bum): pa shind tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan
281a3('bum): ba'i sems rgya chen po/ shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ shinang tu bsgoms pas 'jig rtend chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
281a4('bum): pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas parabakang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par pyod do// de myi myigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen
281a5('bum): po/ shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gtsug sa myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ lhod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rtend chos kyi dbyings
281a6('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te
281a7('bum): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
281a8('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/
281b1('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nung
281b2('bum): zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
281b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan 'di dag dang tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /
281b4('bum): tshul dang mtshan ma mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i cha yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/
281b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi da ge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa
281b6('bum): dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems
281b7('bum): kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
281b8('bum): de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa'i rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la
282a1('bum): rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
282a2('bum): yid bde ba dang myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed pa sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan
282a3('bum): ba'i sems rgya chen po/ shinang tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shinang tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
282a4('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/ phyogs bcu rgyas bar bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shi nad tu yangs pa/
282a5('bum): myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa/ lhod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shi nad tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas
282a6('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shinang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa

282b2('bum): par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha'
282b3('bum): mtha' las so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad ku rnamama'a'amatha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha
282b4('bum): yas so zhes/ nam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bas+t+ra bas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad tunam shes mthams skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yong
282b5('bum): ro nas chung bar byed pa'i skyem ched la nye ba'i bsgrubs te gnas de rnam pa thams cad du chung bar myed pa'i skye mched las sa ga par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed kyi ni sku ma
282b6('bum): sa gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas mo// 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsas gtan te/ nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo bsam gtan 'di sa
282b7('bum): dang / cad byed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs sbed pa nasod pa 'di dag la rnam su pa'i rnam pa dang rdul dang mtshanams/ mnyam par gnag cing rnam par snang ba'i sa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
282b8('bum): nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to gyi
283a1('bum): dge'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/
283a2('bum): de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzind las skyes
283a3('bum): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/
283a4('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dra dan ba dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan
283a5('bum): gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba/ yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/

288b4('bum): rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang
288b5('bum): spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nu ba pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed bri/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan
288b6('bum): bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de nas pa tham sa cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
288b7('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad tu rnam sal yas skye mched
288b8('bum): lam la das par 'das te/ rnam par shes sam pa' sas mo zhes rnam par shes ma mapa' sas su ma med la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dernam pa thams cad rgyam shes mama' sa
289a1('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
289a2('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzind te/ byang chub
289a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang /
289a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing 'chad pa dang stond cing / 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing ga sal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang de dag gi skyon dang 'byung
289a5('bum): ba yang / tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam
289a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag/ mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang
289a7('bum): yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
289a8('bum): phyind pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang /
289b1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstand to snyam du sems shing / yid
289b2('bum): la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang rtog pa dang sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam
289b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
289b4('bum): rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
289b6('bum): bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ba
289b7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
289b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang /
290a1('bum): byams pa dang snying rje dang dag pa dang btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du
290a2('bum): shes myin skye mched de dag myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myed pa'i rnam pa dang zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smon
290a3('bum): pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog kyang bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myi dmyigs shing de dag gis rlom sems su myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
290a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
290a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du/
290a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang
290a7('bum): po lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
290a8('bum): sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad myed pa rnams sgom pa dang /
290b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par tha rad pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
290b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams
290b3('bum): sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzind nams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /
290b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang
290b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa tha mas cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang /
290b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
290b7('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzind la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems
290b8('bum): can thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bya'o zhes de la gnol par byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyam sa
291a1('bum): su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dkrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
291a2('bum): bar gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
291a3('bum): phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams
291a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngo ba 'di ni/ bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad myed pa
291a5('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang /
291a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/ ma 'dre sa par rnam par spyod do// sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa myi skyed kyi rnam pa thams cad
291a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
291a8('bum): dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ myi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phur sum tshogs par bya ba'i don tu brtson 'grus
291b1('bum): myi gtong bas/ rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
291b2('bum): chen po/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
291b3('bum): 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang myi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang myed la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang myi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad myed pa
