291b4('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
291b5('bum): bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba de dag la myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug
291b6('bum): bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myed pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang / rang
291b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi skyon myed par yang 'jug par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
291b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul
292a1('bum): gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i
292a2('bum): tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul
292a3('bum): gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
292a4('bum): nyid shes kyang dmyig pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba myed dpa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma
292a5('bum): yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shesakyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong
292a6('bum): pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po myed
292a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha
292a8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ theg pa chen po ni chos thams cad la/ sems rnam par myi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan
292b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag/
292b2('bum): ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug/ myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa dang // bde zhes bya bar shes pa myi 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar
292b3('bum): shes pa myi 'jug/ bdag myed ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug/ myi stug ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni
292b4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292b5('bum): chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa myi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa myi 'jug/ da ltar gyi dus la shes pa myi 'jug par myi byed de/ dus gsum myi dmyin/
292b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'di la dus gsum gyi shes pa yang sdud pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
292b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la
292b8('bum): 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams myi shes pa yang myed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
293a1('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rtend pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par
293a2('bum): myi byed/ 'jig rtend las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par myi byed kyang / 'jig rtend pa dang 'jig
293a3('bum): rtend las 'das pa'i chos myi shes pa yang myed/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa myed pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang myi shes pa yang myed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
293a4('bum): 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa tshe dang lnga na pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
293a5('bum): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
293a6('bum): byind pa la spyod pa'i / sbyin pa'i pha ro mang tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang kyi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i ba rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa'
293a7('bum): yang myi dmyigs/ le nad pa yod kyi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol
293a8('bum): tu kyi nad pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// me dang ldan pa sha ra na ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims
293b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des tshul khrims kyang myi dmyigs tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid
293b2('bum): la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o//
293b3('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang bzod pa
293b4('bum): yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi myigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
293b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
293b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang myi dmyigs/
293b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
293b8('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
294a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi
294a2('bum): dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi
294a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
294a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des dge ba'i chos kyang myi dmyigs/ myi dge ba dang 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa dang / 'dus
294a5('bum): byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos kyang myi dmyigs shing / shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
294a6('bum): yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes
294a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
294a8('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
294b1('bum): ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa
294b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
294b3('bum): dos tu kyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs
294b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs
294b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dris pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi
294b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i
294b7('bum): tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
294b8('bum): gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
295a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i
295a2('bum): tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
295a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa
295a4('bum): nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi
295a5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ ba sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
295a6('bum): gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed
295a7('bum): pastong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom
295a8('bum): mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo//
295b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi
295b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i
295b3('bum): tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
295b4('bum): gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs
295b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
295b6('bum): gyis spobs lnga sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang
295b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags
295b8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
296a1('bum): gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i/
296a2('bum): tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chad myed
296a3('bum): pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
296a4('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenadapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
296a5('bum): rnam pa tha rad pa brgyad sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad many+dzu/ nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgo ma pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
296a6('bum): gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu myi
296a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa/ bsgom pa
296a8('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par
296b1('bum): bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
296b2('bum): tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi
296b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de
296b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu
296b5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgo ma mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa/ 'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par
296b6('bum): bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu
296b7('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
296b8('bum): dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/
297a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshor ba
297a2('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'du shes dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/
297a3('bum): 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig ces bya ba 'di
297a4('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sna dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/
297a5('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lus dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lus shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam/ du zad do// yid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid ces bya
297a6('bum): ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sgra dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ smra zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dri dmyigs
297a7('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ro dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dini mying tsam du zad do// reg dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir reg zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/
297a8('bum): chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba'i
297b1('bum): rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying
297b2('bum): tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam
297b3('bum): par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs
297b4('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni myi nga tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam
297b5('bum): du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i
297b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lus kyi'o dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
297b7('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las
297b8('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du
298a1('bum): zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
298a2('bum): ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te/
298a3('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam tu zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di
298a4('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do// sa'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chu'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes
298a5('bum): bya ba 'din mying tsam du zad do// mye'i khams dmyigs su rtse da pa'i phyir/ mye'i khams zhes bya ba 'din myong tsam du zad ro// rlung gi khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rlung gi
298a6('bum): khams zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i khams dmyigs su myed
298a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// ma rig pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'don mying tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i
298a8('bum): phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// mying dang gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i
298b1('bum): phyir/ mying dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// skye mched drug dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir reg
298b2('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sred pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad
298b3('bum): lend pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lend pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// srid pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// skye ba dmyigs su myed pa'i
298b4('bum): phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rga shi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam duzad do// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed
298b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
298b6('bum): tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus
298b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// skabasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
298b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du
299a1('bum): zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying
299a2('bum): tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces
299a3('bum): bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ don
299a4('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus bya/ sa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'dus
299a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ma tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/
299a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni snying tsam du zad do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad
299a7('bum): da / don bskyed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'din gyi nam du zad do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya
299a8('bum): ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i
299b1('bum): phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong sa nyid ces bya ba 'dan sding cas du zad du/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'din myosas du zad do// dngas po byed
299b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam
299b3('bum): du zad do// dngas po byed pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su byed pa'i phyir/ dngas po myed pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'dini myi tsam du zad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su
299b4('bum): byed pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i zhes bya ba 'di ni mying cam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spyod pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di
299b5('bum): ni gying tsam du zad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba don mying tsam du zad do// dbang po rnams dmyigs sum+b+ha
299b6('bum): ba'i phyir/ dbang po zhes bya ba 'din mying tsam du zad do// stobs rnams dmyigs su byed pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'din mying tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i
299b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun zhes bya ba 'dzin gying tsam du zad de/ las dmyigs su myed pa'i phyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'don gyi ma du za nga/ 'phags pa'i
299b8('bum): bden pa rnams dbyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bdes pa pan zhes bya ba 'di ni myi tsam tu zad do// bas gtan nams dbyigs su byed pa'i phyir/ zamam gtan pa'i zhes bya ba 'din gying
300a1('bum): tsam du zad do// tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshad myed pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/
300a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/
300a3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
300a4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad
300a5('bum): ro/ mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzind rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzind
300a6('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyi gas su myed pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs
300a7('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myi 'jigs pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do//
300a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya/
300b1('bum): 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di na mying tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmyigs
300b2('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ma no rad pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzhan ma
300b3('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du
300b4('bum): zad do// chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi
300b5('bum): gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// chos smra na myed pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos skyon myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha'
300b6('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// byang chub dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas
300b7('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par rab tu shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300b8('bum): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o//
301a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
301a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smyind par byed do//
301a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang /
301a4('bum): phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang
301a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyand to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs
301a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can nams yongs su sbyind par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang myo 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung / spangs
301a7('bum): rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su myed pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don tu bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin
301a8('bum): de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur kyi bar du theg pa deg nam du myi 'bral te/ res rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang
301b1('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i
301b2('bum): 'jig rtend kyis bskor bar myi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sha rang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams
301b3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzadacing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg po bla
301b4('bum): na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di sa sa bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi
301b5('bum): 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa smog cing / dbyangs yu rjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
301b6('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i
301b7('bum): mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing /
301b8('bum): dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byes snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing /
302a1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya
302a2('bum): gapa zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa
302a3('bum): mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend kyi
302a4('bum): khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa
302a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ khye nang pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod
302a6('bum): pa mdzad do// byang shar kyi phyog mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing
302a7('bum): 'jig rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig
302a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa
302b1('bum): mdzad do// gard lce'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams ga ga'i klung gi byem snyed dgan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan sa na marjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten kyi rnams
302b2('bum): che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa 'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad
302b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi
302b4('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gas pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig
302b5('bum): rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya
302b6('bum): bzhig/ num pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'jo ra lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su
302b7('bum): brjod pa mdzad do// nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi the ma snyed dag nA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdza
302b8('bum): 'jig rten kyi khams tshig mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla ma byed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhin
303a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og
303a2('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems
303a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
303a4('bum): thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
303a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan pa rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
303a6('bum): chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi
303a7('bum): 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang
303a8('bum): dag par gnas shes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go mchen po bgos so// goca chen po bzhom
303b1('bum): so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
303b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i ko tsa gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
303b3('bum): pa'i go tsa bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go tsa bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i go ca bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go tsa bgos bsam gtan gyi pha rol
303b4('bum): tu phyind pa'i go ca bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa da'i go tsa bgos// nang stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ phyi ste/ nga pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos
303b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos chen po stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos/ 'dus ma byas
303b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ko tsa bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ rang bzhin stong
303b7('bum): pa nyid go ca bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go
303b8('bum): bgos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go ca bgos yang dag par spong ba'i kon bgos
304a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go tsa bgos/ dbang po'i gautso bgos/ stobs kyi go ca bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi gotsa bgos/ lam gyi ko tsa bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i
304a2('bum): go tsa bgos bsam gtan gyi go tsa bgos/ tshad myed pa'i go tsa bgos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go ca bgos/ rnam par tha rad pa'i go ca bgos/ mthar kyis gnas
304a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go ca bgos rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i go tsa bgos mngon par shes pa'i go ca bgos ting nge 'dzind
304a4('bum): gyi go tsa bgos gzungs kyi sgo'i go tsa bgos de ba zhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go tsa bgos myi 'jigs pa'i go tsa bgos so so yang dag par rig pa'i go tsa
304a5('bum): bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go tsa bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go ca bgos rnam pams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ko tsa bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi
304a6('bum): sku'i go tsa bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'o 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar da phyogs kyi 'a jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
304a7('bum): par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
304a8('bum): par 'gengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// bya bshar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ka'i klung gi
304b1('bum): bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// shard lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
304b2('bum): 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//
304b3('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//
304b4('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di rnam pa dru ga tu rab tu spyod do// shar da phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod //
304b5('bum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten/ dgi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu
304b6('bum): bskyod do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga/ 'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi
304b7('bum): bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// sharang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi
304b8('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed nam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi
305a1('bum): 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do//
305a2('bum): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
305a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba
305a4('bum): dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des se mas can dmyal ba de dag nas ldang ngo // de dag sems ca na dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas
305a5('bum): kyi zhing gang dang gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// res stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di
305a6('bum): nabyol mong gi skye gnas kyi/ sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
305a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal mo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyings su zlog na/ de'i ni byol mong gi ste gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas
305a8('bum): da pa ngas sa // re ga dga' pa dang 'ad ba des byas ma 'i phyigam dganas nas par rung ngo // de dag rgyas song gi sreganapa de dag ngas rnam par sangs sa ngas rgyas ma
305b1('bum): gang dang gangan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di na/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sems can
305b2('bum): rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes
305b3('bum): bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas gi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde de gshin rje'i 'jig
305b4('bum): rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi nga gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
305b5('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de
305b6('bum): dag thams cad myod par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal
305b7('bum): pa pa'i sems can/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'bob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par snang ngo // de dag sa
305b8('bum): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang / de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig
306a1('bum): rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
306a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde
306a3('bum): ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang
306a4('bum): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 2tsho skyong ba de dang dag tu skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
306a5('bum): can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cadamyed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya ngadag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/
306a6('bum): zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des
306a7('bum): sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems cad dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhug zhing
306a8('bum): 'tsho spong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phyi'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byed te/
306b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang
306b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par
306b3('bum): langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang
306b4('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
306b5('bum): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyang / sa sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang
306b6('bum): bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmya la ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
306b7('bum): gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// res shard lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
306b8('bum): sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i
307a1('bum): sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde
307a2('bum): ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
307a3('bum): shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thos
307a4('bum): cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems
307a5('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dethos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga'/ pa dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par
307a6('bum): ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par longs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu
307a7('bum): skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed smod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin
307a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs
307b1('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nam rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/
307b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
307b3('bum): dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya
307b4('bum): ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra re thos na sa/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang
307b5('bum): bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
307b6('bum): rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
307b7('bum): cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i se sems can dmyal ba pa'i
307b8('bum): sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal
308a1('bum): ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar da phyogs kyi 'jig
308a2('bum): rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang gi sdug bsngal
308a3('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe
308a4('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba
308a5('bum): des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de/ dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs
308a6('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma
308a7('bum): snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
308a8('bum): cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i cha byol song gi skye gnas dang / gzhin
308b1('bum): rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend
308b2('bum): de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
308b3('bum): shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can
308b4('bum): rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nga gi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
308b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra ba rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye ga nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de
308b6('bum): ngag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
308b7('bum): de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de
308b8('bum): dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes bI sems can rnams kyi byol song
309a1('bum): kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de/
309a2('bum): la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas
309a3('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje
309a4('bum): 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhu gas shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang
309a5('bum): shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol
309a6('bum): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang gi sdug bsdu la ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
309a7('bum): de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/
309a8('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /
309b1('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong pa de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar
309b2('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /
309b3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i
309b4('bum): sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde
309b5('bum): ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de de dag nas rnam pa ra sdang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
309b6('bum): rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs
309b7('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang
309b8('bum): gzhas rdzab la jigagarang gsug bsngal la ltad cag ya la ga ga thams cad zha bar byas te/ rabazham gshegs pa 'gra btsam pa sa sa dag pa mjugs pa'i sangs rgyal ba la phyag 'amal la' nas rgya
310a1('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal
310a2('bum): lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang /
310a3('bum): bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol so rgya skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag
310a4('bum): nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gangan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'a skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs
310a5('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ste/ de dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'ji/ ga rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams byol song gi skye gan
310a6('bum): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag
310a7('bum): 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga'
310a8('bum): ba dang bde bathob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
310b1('bum): rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
310b2('bum): rtend gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sdug
310b3('bum): bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs
310b4('bum): sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sang sa rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/
310b5('bum): de dag dga' ba dang bde des/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
310b6('bum): de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
310b7('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi
310b8('bum): sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do//
311a1('bum): dbyangs sgrog go// de'i rgyam song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/
311a2('bum): ngag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam
311a3('bum): par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhamado
311a4('bum): 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i cho ga sa kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi
311a5('bum): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par smra la la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sem sa can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi
311a6('bum): sgra sprogadage 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par gyur pa la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang
311a7('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor da de de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po mtshan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal
311a8('bum): ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis stsa lad pa/
311b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams cad myed grangs myed pa'i sems can rnams/ dran song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang
311b2('bum): sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar/
311b3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go ca chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
311b4('bum): pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten dkyi khams bye dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bye dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas
311b5('bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprulang pa byed do// de lta ra 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod
311b6('bum): pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do// gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do// me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do//
311b7('bum): phreng ba 'dod pa rnams lo phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do// mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed
311b8('bum): do// khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams
312a1('bum): la nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye du
312a2('bum): r+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa la skom byin
312a3('bum): gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/ mal ca 'dod pa la mal ca byin
312a4('bum): khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkye nang rtsi dang yo bya 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu
312a5('bum): tig dang / bye dur+ya dang rlung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gseradangul 'dod pa la nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul byin pa nas/ myi'i yo
312a6('bum): byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stonang to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos
312a7('bum): bstand pa de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sasas rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper
312a8('bum): na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig/
312b1('bum): mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnas pa ni skom byin/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni gzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams ni kos byin/ me tog 'dod pa nas
312b2('bum): ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams ni mel cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams ni
312b3('bum): khyim byin 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams ni/ nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang
312b4('bum): bye dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dungul/ 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang byi rung dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/
312b5('bum): myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang la yang ci
312b6('bum): yang byin pa yod dam/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
312b7('bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnas sa ni skom byin/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams
312b8('bum): la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin
313a1('bum): mal ca 'dod pa rnams la ni mal ca byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyend rtsi
313a2('bum): dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu dang mu tig dang
313a3('bum): bye dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dungul byin pa nas/ myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang byin pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
313a4('bum): de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ go ca chen po
313a5('bum): bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing ched du bsas te/ skye ba
313a6('bum): yongs su bzung bas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod do//
313a7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / chad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
313a8('bum): rang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
313b1('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzind thams
313b2('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
313b3('bum): pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// sems ca na de dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du chos bstand pa de dang /
313b4('bum): nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po/ 'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis la po che'i bzhi mdor
313b5('bum): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi
313b6('bum): dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
313b7('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
313b8('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin
314a1('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang /
314a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang
314a3('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi les bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhan
314a4('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / dbang ba lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
314a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas
314a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi
314a7('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bkod pa yod dam// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//
314a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod /
314b1('bum): khamam gtan bzhi dang / cad byed pa bzhi dang / gzugs byed pa'i rnams par 'jug pa pa'i dang / mngon pa shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par thong pa bzhin
314b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
314b3('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang /
314b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob sa bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa ra rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
314b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa myed do// rab 'byor dade ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na
314b6('bum): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ go ca chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
314b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod bI pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang
314b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/
315a1('bum): rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgyal sems can thams cad bdag la rdo ba dang / dbyig pas
315a2('bum): rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par myi bya'o zhes go tsa bgo bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra la rab tu
315a3('bum): 'god par byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mazhes pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi
315a4('bum): mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shing mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar ba dang / rab tu ngo/ par byas na/ rab 'byor de de la ji snyam du sems
315a5('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bzhi ga pa yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
315a6('bum): rdo ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bzod pa'i pha
315a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos
315a8('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor da des bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go tsa chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
315b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go/
315b2('bum): 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
315b3('bum): phyi nang pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
315b4('bum): bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang / sem sa kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/
315b5('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul da te/
315b6('bum): lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus
315b7('bum): la bkod pa yod das// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lang ba rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
315b8('bum): dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/
316a1('bum): chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab
316a2('bum): 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang
316a3('bum): dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bas
316a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thos
316a5('bum): cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am 'khrug pa myed par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin te/
316a6('bum): de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing / gnog pa dang 'god par byed de/ de ltar yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang nam bla na myed
316a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na
316a8('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis le po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po 'tshigs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam
316b1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
