353b1('bum): stong sa nyid ces bya'o// de la dngos po myed pa'ajam nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rkyend cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir/ shum mamapas lda kyad ducu rtag kya dag par byar
353b2('bum): 'dus pa'i cham nyid byed de kyi rtag kyi 'jig pa'i phyir/ 'dus pa 'dus pas ltung // des 'byor zhen/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir/ 'di ni ris po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid ces bya'o//
353b3('bum): rab 'byor da gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos sbyong ngo // dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas stong ngo // rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos spong ngo // de la
353b4('bum): dngom po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po ste/ phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong bas/ re ltaradangos po dngos pos stong ngo // ji ltar na dngos po myed pa
353b5('bum): dngos po myed pas stong zhe na/ dngos po myed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas ste/ 'dus ma byas de yang 'dus ma byas/ kyis stong pas/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa dngos po myed pas
353b6('bum): spong ngo // ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na/ rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste/ de la stong pa nyid ga yin pa de ni shes pa ma byas/ mthong bas ma byas te/ 'di
353b7('bum): ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi gnas
353b8('bum): nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de
354a1('bum): bzhin tu gnas pa ste/ de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste/ rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
354a2('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
354a3('bum): bam po / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
354a4('bum): po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rin cen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i
354a5('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzi nad dang / zla ba'i rgyas mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shinang tu 'phags
354a6('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
354a7('bum): 'dzind dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ting nge 'dzin
354a8('bum): la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yang dag
354b1('bum): par 'phags pa zhes bya ba nying nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i tshig la gdon rtsil par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang / rig sa dkyus sa yang dag par jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge la 'i
354b2('bum): dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad pa
354b3('bum): das par rgya rgya byeg bya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa rnam pa rgyas par shengs pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin da rong kyis 'a'o 'i 'dzin dang
354b4('bum): mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyu da kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / song
354b5('bum): ge rnam par sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyo mongs pa spong ba zhe sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i
354b6('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / tshol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rtend pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dri ma myed
354b7('bum): ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang /
354b8('bum): dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
355a1('bum): dang / zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzind dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zad pa dang bral
355a2('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba dri ma myed
355a3('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snang ba zhes bya ba la tang nge 'dzind dam/ snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya
355a4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang / ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems
355a5('bum): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzizhid dang / kun tu snang ba ni sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba 'atong nge 'dzin dang / rin cen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge
355a6('bum): 'dzind dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos kyi
355a7('bum): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god
355a8('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang /
355b1('bum): rnam par myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mying nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas myed par dpyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ti
355b2('bum): 'dzind dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yul las rga lad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur
355b3('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes
355b4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad las 'da'
355b5('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nem nur rnam par seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya
355b6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo/ 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyu ra pa zhes bya ba'i ti
355b7('bum): nge 'dzind dang / rnam par 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad 'ong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
355b8('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang
356a1('bum): mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga'/
356a2('bum): ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad
356a3('bum): yang dag par seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i
356a4('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting
356a5('bum): nge 'dzind dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa tha mas cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang
356a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyon mongs pa skyed par yang dag par/ gzhol ba zhes
356a7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya
356a8('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ngag gi skyon rnam
356b1('bum): par 'jig pas nam mkhal ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa skyed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
356b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u brgyad do// // de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes
356b3('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa ste/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rin cen phyag rgya
356b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin des/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rini cen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to//
356b5('bum): de la seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cadakyis rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba
356b6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla
356b7('bum): ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan
356b8('bum): 'dzind pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos thams cad las shi nad tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de
357a1('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/ 'di na chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spyi
357a2('bum): gtsuganam par smra ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzi gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzi de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzidid thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par smra ban+de/ 'dzin smrig cug rnam par la bcom
357a3('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// des chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini dgang zhen/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing chos kyi dbyings su rtogs par 'gro ba ste/ 'drim
357a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge
357a5('bum): 'dzinang thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges pa 'dzin pa ste 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dbul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da to// de la rdo rjezhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhes
357a6('bum): ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
357a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// re la
357a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste
357b1('bum): 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting
357b2('bum): nge 'dzind thams cad kyi 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// des gung rnam bar dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
357b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par 'god pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes
357b4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la ka nas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes
357b5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon gyi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi
357b6('bum): nges pa'i tshig bsta nad pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa 'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes
357b7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chog bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
357b8('bum): ting nge 'dzind to// de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba
358a1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge rnams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs
358a2('bum): su 'dzind pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
358a3('bum): thams cad nyam par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting
358a4('bum): nge 'dzind de la gnas pas/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge
358a5('bum): 'dzind to// de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyis nam mkha'
358a6('bum): rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
358a7('bum): gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzind pa ste 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinan to// de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya
358a8('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to//
358b1('bum): de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dgang zhen/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas gsating nge 'dzin thams cad snyam me snyan ne sa rer byed pa/ 'dun rnam par
358b2('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la tshol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang tshol ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni tshol ba myed pa zhes
358b3('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas la rtend pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnas la rtend par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/
358b4('bum): 'di ni gnas la rtend pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / sems kyang myi 'byung
358b5('bum): sems las byung ba rnams kyang myi rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la dri ma myed pa 'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
358b6('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi smon ma dri ma myed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinan to// de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ka
358b7('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'don 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting
358b8('bum): nge 'dzind 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting

359b1('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad zad myi shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad pa dang
359b2('bum): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi g.yo myi 'gul rab tu myi 'byed/
359b3('bum): rlom sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
359b4('bum): thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting

359b6('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa myed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i
359b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzi nid de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyim so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
359b8('bum): de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzidad thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang bar byed pa zhes ting nge 'dzind to// de
360a1('bum): la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
360a2('bum): des ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dgang zhen/ ting nge 'dzinid de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ 'di na ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting

360a4('bum): ste/ 'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas na/ sems myi g.yo'o/ rnam par myi g.yo
360a5('bum): rnam par myi ldog/ yongs su yi 'chad par myi 'gyur/ nyam/ sa su myi bde ba myed la/ de la sems shes bya ba ni 'di yin zhe/ sa bya bar sems myi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhe

360a8('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin cen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin cen mtha' ltar kun nas spang ba ste/ 'di ni rin cen
360b1('bum): mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad la phyag rgya myed pa'i mthas phyag rgyas
360b2('bum): btab pa nye bar bzung bas/ phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/
360b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la dga' ba spong
360b4('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
360b5('bum): nge 'dzin to// de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi mun pa seld pa dang / ting nge 'dzin zas
360b6('bum): cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'don chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzidzin to// de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing
360b7('bum): chos thams cad rnam par 'bor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
360b8('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thos cad kyi chani rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes/
361a1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di na yo ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
361a2('bum): to// de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i/
361a3('bum): ting nge 'dzind to// de la dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyang dmyigs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni dmyigs
361a4('bum): pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind/ de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur bar myi dmyigs
361a5('bum): pa ste/ 'di ni 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rnam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa
361a6('bum): tsam yang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
361a7('bum): thams cad kyi gnas pa dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing /
361a8('bum): chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par selang ba ste/ 'di ni rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'jan de la gnas shing / ting
361b1('bum): nge 'dzind thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la g.yo' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas

361b3('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni yul las rga lad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
361b4('bum): 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tsho gas rjes su 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya
361b5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems myi 'jug pa ste/ 'di na
361b6('bum): sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind kyi dge ba'i me tog
361b7('bum): rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
361b8('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinind to// de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

362b4('bum): ti nge dzin de sagan ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su myed par nga dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtogs pas srid pa'i
362b5('bum): gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe/ na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzi nad thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/ de la zhugs
362b6('bum): pa'i phyir khong du chud pa gang yang myed pa ste/ 'di ni rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
362b7('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi brda dang sgra la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni brda dang sgra la 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba
362b8('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad yi ge dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
363a1('bum): 'dzind to// de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad gzi brjid kyis lham me ldan ne lha rer byed pa
363a2('bum): ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi
363a3('bum): mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
363a4('bum): 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad mngon bar dmyigs pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
363a5('bum): to// de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ti nga nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par
363a6('bum): 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
363a7('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad la bde ba dang / sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga'
363a8('bum): ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad zad par rung bar yang
363b1('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zed myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing
363b2('bum): gzungs thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo glos bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
363b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad yang dag pa dang / log par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting
363b4('bum): nge 'dzin to// de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag pa zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad
363b5('bum): la 'gal ba dang / 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to//
363b6('bum): de la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'a ji nad thams cad la 'thun dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su myi
363b7('bum): mthong ba ste/ 'don 'thun pa dang / 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting
363b8('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snying po dang ldan pa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen
364a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad snying po yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di na stong po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla
364a2('bum): ba dri ma myed pa rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su
364a3('bum): rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing /
364a4('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad rgya nad chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraste/ 'di ni rgya nad chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
364a5('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas zhing / ting 'dzind thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
364a6('bum): de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'a dzi nad thams cad la 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs/ rtse gcig
364a7('bum): kyang myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya bto 'dzind to// de la nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
364a8('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la nyon mongs pa dang /
364b1('bum): bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dgang zhen/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang / bcas pa thams cad nyon
364b2('bum): mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to//
364b3('bum): de la gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas
364b4('bum): dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ to// de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa zhe/ sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas
364b5('bum): shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyi ra myi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de lus
364b6('bum): kyi skyon yang dag par selang pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi lus myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par selang
364b7('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi
364b8('bum): ngag gi las myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing /
365a1('bum): gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa 'thob pa ste/
365a2('bum): 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa rnam par grol zhing / gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind te/ rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
365a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u dgu pa'o//
365a4('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang da' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye
365a5('bum): bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa'o// de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang
365a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran
365a7('bum): ba dang / ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid kyi bde ba rnam par bsald cing rnam par spyod kyang / lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi tog go// phyi'i lus
365a8('bum): la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ga 'jig rtend gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsa lad cing rnam par spyod kyang
365b1('bum): lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig
365b2('bum): rten gi chags sems dang yid kyi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
365b3('bum): tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam
365b4('bum): par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi'i tshor la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang dran pa dang ldan pas
365b5('bum): 'jig rtend gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam pa ra bstsa la cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang gi
365b6('bum): tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rtenang gi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par
365b7('bum): bstsald cing / rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /
365b8('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog
366a1('bum): pa rnams la rnam par gyi rtog go// bya'i sems la de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su la zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten
366a2('bum): gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsald cing rnam par spyod kyang / sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
366a3('bum): sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsald cing rnam par spyod kyang / sems
366a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing 'artson 'grus na shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa
366a5('bum): dang ldan pas 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go//
366a6('bum): phyi'i chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam
366a7('bum): par bas yad cing / rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson
366a8('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid kyi bde ba rnam par bskul cing / rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams
366b1('bum): la rnam par myi rtog go// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems
366b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyal na nyal lo
366b3('bum): zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ de'i lus nyams bde ba 'am/ nyams myi bde yang rung ste/ ji lta ji ltar gnas pa de lta de ltar des rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seMs
366b4('bum): dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems
366b5('bum): dang yid kyi bde ba rnam par bsald cing / rnam par spyo/ da do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i
366b6('bum): rgyal kyis lus kyi rjes sul zhing / rnam par spyod de/ la 'gro 'am 'ongs shes bzhin du myong ba yin/ sku 'am rnam par lta yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum 'am brgyangs
366b7('bum): shes bzhin du thong ba yin/ snru sa dang srung meng 'drang zhing khyod kya / shes pazhin du spyod pa yin/ thos pa dang 'dzes pa dang 'brangs pa dang / myangs pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/
366b8('bum): nyal ba dang / gnyid kyi mya myo bsu lad pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba 'am 'dug pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa/
367a1('bum): gnyid kyis log gam ma log na yang / shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang myi smra na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/
367a2('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus
367a3('bum): can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsald cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
367a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyo da pa'i tshe/ dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyun yang dran zhing dbu gas nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dran zhing
367a5('bum): dbugs phyir rgyun yang dran zhing / dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs nang du ring du rgyun yang dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs
367a6('bum): phyir ring du rgyun yang dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya' bar rab tu shes so// dbugs nang du thung du rgyun yang dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyun yang
367a7('bum): dbugs phyir thung du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo skor ba'i mtshan bu mkhas pa ni ring du bskor
367a8('bum): naring du skor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thung ngu skor na thung ngu skor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
367b1('bum): shesasas kyi chom phyin pas byung pa dran par dathugs na rgyal na yang dran par gags na rgyas po zhes par ra shes so// dran par gags sbyi rnam nas
367b2('bum): bar dbugs phyir rgyas so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs ring du ma du rgyus na yang dbugs ring du rang du rgyas so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na yang dbug pa
367b3('bum): ring du phyir rgyas so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs thung du nang du rgyus na yang dbugs zung du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs thung du phyir rgyus na yang dbugs thung du phyir rgyus
367b4('bum): so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshenang gi lus la
367b5('bum): gyi dmyigs pa'i rgyal kyis/ lus kyi rjes su s+thA n-i rtsor 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi rmugs sems dang srid kyi bde brnam par
367b6('bum): bal ci rnam par gyur ro// rab 'ar gzham rna sems dpa' sems sa shes bkyis man kyi pas
367b7('bum): chu'i rnams dang / kye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang sod do// zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag pa ji lta pa bzhin du rab tu cog ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di la ste dpe
367b8('bum): nab lang gi gan pa 'am/ ba lang gi gnad pa'i mtshan bu ma khas pas/ mtshon rnon mo sogs te/ ba yang bas dacing zag bzhir gshegs te/ de skar mo sor phye nas 'greng dab/
368a1('bum): 'dug ste/ de sa rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa yang / lus 'di la
368a2('bum): sa'i khams kyang yod do// chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang / yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ rab 'byor
368a3('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ nang gi lus la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes
368a4('bum): su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal ci/
368a5('bum): rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid
368a6('bum): la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad sgra dang / glad pa man chad du sen po dang / spu dang pags pa yan cad du myi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus
368a7('bum): 'di la sgra dang / sU sen mo dang phags pa dang / klog pad dang / chub dang / da nus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang /
368a8('bum): mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mcher ba dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / rnyem dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / dungul dang /
368b1('bum): da/ skabs dang sa/ ka hA/ mchis pa / bdagan da mye dang / m+bu dang / zad pa dang / thang rgyal dang /
368b2('bum): ma dang / na skabs dag kyarang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog se rab 'byor da 'di la ste dper na rkun pa'i skye snod tim yungs kar dang
368b3('bum): sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang / kro dang / 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis kang ba myig dang ldan pa'i myi zhog phye ste/ bltas na 'di ni til lo/
368b4('bum): 'di ni yungs kar ro// 'di ni srin chung ngo // 'di ni ba da la sran no// 'di ni nas so// 'di ni gro'o// 'di ni 'bras so// 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru
368b5('bum): gzhan no// zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la/

369a1('bum): dang bsnabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang mkhris pa dang

369b8('bum): zhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo
370a1('bum): rnams klang dga' bar 'gyur ro// ma'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//

370a3('bum): 'di la don par sangs rgya chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i donabadag cag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes tshangs
370a4('bum): na snang rnamarnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang dka' bar 'gyur ro//

370a6('bum): ro/ kya ma snang / kyang dag 'a bar 'gyur ro// 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i
370a7('bum): gas ras rab gyi pha rol tu phyir ba dru gagis rnam par 'phes par 'gyur ba de
370a8('bum): mas dpa'i sem pa pa'i rigs kyi bu rang rgya lags kyi bu ma na dag cag rnaM sems pa ma che la 'di'i pa dam/ dang / mu ru dang / sring po dang / chungs dang /
370b1('bum): thams cad la 'a myod pa ni zhes bya ba gas pa'i shes lta yu dang rna 'gyur sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin
370b2('bum): ba/ sha ra pa ti'i na gzhan lu kang chub sems sems dpa' chen pos 9rab kyi phu rol da tu phyin pa la myod pa'i mas ltar ya sbyang
370b3('bum): yongs su las 'das kyang rim po'i chos rnab ces bya ba'i sgra yang myi gral pas 'gyur snyam na pa shes rab pha rol de tu yi nam pa la
370b4('bum): ra dr-i ta'i bu ba na yang byang sedapa' sem pa' chen po shes rabagyi pha yid tu nang po la spyod 'jomar yongs su brtag par
370b5('bum): pa lngar dag byad thotsan rgya pa 'ji che rar kyai mas ga ka'i klu / sems tsam pabla kye sems rdzogs

370b9('bum): 'dogs par myi bgyid do// de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhend par myi bgyid la 'dogs

370b11('bum): myi bgyid do// de'i tshe 'di ni sde'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len gyi gnas te/ mngon par zhend par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid
370b12('bum): de de'i tshe 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myig nas te/ mngon par zhend par myi bgyid la 'dogs pa
370b13('bum): myi bgyid do// de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi dmyigs na dmyi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhend par myi bgyid
370b14('bum): la 'dogs par myi bgyid do// de'i tshe 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhend par

370b18('bum): shing myi lend myi gnas te/ mngon par zhend par myi bgyid la 'dog sa kyi phyi / de ci 'din med kyi 'dus te ga ni na gyi cho n+de byanas kyi su te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi dmyigs shing myi len da myi gnas te
370b19('bum): mngon par zhend partsi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa na
